column2: b'Its not enough to praise our essential workers  we have to protect and pay them.'

b'The workers on the frontlines of this pandemic are making extraordinary sacrifices every single day. They deserve leaders who will listen and work as hard for them as they are for their communities. As president, thats exactly what Ill do. '
b'The health care workers on the frontlines of this pandemic are true heroes. Tune in as we thank them for their work and discuss how a Biden-Harris administration will support them. '

b"Today, KamalaHarris and I met with some of our country's most experienced national security experts to discuss the challenges facing our nation, our institutions, and the world. We're ready to tackle the challenges our administration will inherit on day one. "

b'Im keeping in my prayers all of our friends and neighbors in Hurricane Iotas path and those impacted by Hurricane Eta across Central America. The increasing frequency of these powerful storms is another reason that fighting climate change will be one of my top priorities.'

b"Americans want us to cooperate. They want us to deliver results. Thats the choice Kamala and I will make. That's why I am pleased that today we were able to bring together business and labor leaders to make that choice with us.\n\nWere all Americans. Lets get to work together."

b'When we build back better, we will do so with higher wages  including a $15 minimum wage  better benefits and stronger collective bargaining rights that you can raise a family on.\n\nThats how we will build back the middle class better than ever.'

b'Right now, Congress should come together and pass a COVID relief package like the HEROES Act that the House passed six months ago. Once we shut down the virus and deliver economic relief to workers and businesses, then we can build back better than ever before.'
b'Tune in as I deliver remarks on our economic recovery and how my administration plans to build back better in the long term. '

b'Once again, I congratulate the brilliant women and men who produced this breakthrough and have brought us one step closer to beating this virus. I am also thankful for the frontline workers who are still confronting the virus around the clock.'

b"Today's news of a second vaccine is further reason to feel hopeful. What was true with the first vaccine remains true with the second: we are still months away. Until then, Americans need to continue to practice social-distancing and mask-wearing to get the virus under control."

b"Congratulations to NASA and SpaceX on today's launch. Its a testament to the power of science and what we can accomplish by harnessing our innovation, ingenuity, and determination. I join all Americans and the people of Japan in wishing the astronauts Godspeed on their journey."

b'To the millions of Hindus, Jains, Sikhs, and Buddhists celebrating the Festival of Lights, DrBiden and I send our best wishes for a HappyDiwali. May your new year be filled with hope, happiness, and prosperity. Sal Mubarak.'

b'I am the president-elect, but will not be president until next year. COVID-19 does not respect dates on the calendar, it is accelerating right now. Urgent action is needed today, now, by the current administration.'
b'I am alarmed by the surge in reported COVID-19 infections, hospitalizations, and fatalities. This crisis demands a robust and immediate federal response which has been woefully lacking.'

b'As the remnants of Tropical Storm Eta continue to impact the east coast, I encourage everyone in its path to heed the warnings of emergency responders and local officials. Jill and I send our prayers to those facing yet another storm.'

b'Today marks five years since the horrific ISIS terrorist attacks in Paris  an assault not just on the people of France but against our common humanity.\n\nAs president, I will work to protect Americans and our allies, countering terrorism and extremist violence in all forms.'

b'I extend my deep condolences to the loved ones of the peacekeepers, including 6 American service members, who died on Tiran Island, and wish a speedy recovery to the surviving American. I join all Americans in honoring their sacrifice, as I keep their loved ones in my prayers.'

b'Because of the Affordable Care Act:

- People with pre-existing conditions are protected
- More than 20 million Americans gained coverage
- Nearly 12 million seniors have had their prescription drug costs reduced

Now more than ever, we have to protect and build on it. '

b'Ron Klains deep, varied experience and capacity to work with people all across the political spectrum is precisely what I need in a White House chief of staff as we confront this moment of crisis and bring our country together again. '

b'This Veterans Day, I feel the full weight of the honor and the responsibility that has been entrusted to me by the American people as the next president, and I vow to honor our countrys sacred obligation. '

b'Today, we honor the service of those who have worn the uniform of the Armed Forces of the United States. \n\nTo our proud veteransI will be a commander in chief who respects your sacrifice, understands your service, and will never betray the values you fought so bravely to defend.'
b'We are going to build a health care system that puts you and your family first  and that every American can be proud of.'
b'If youre sick, if youre struggling, if youre worried about how youre going to get through the day  we will not abandon you.\n\nWe will not leave you to face these challenges alone. '
b'When Im speaking to foreign leaders, Im telling them: America is going to be back. Were going to be back in the game.'
b'Come January, we will work quickly with Congress to dramatically ramp up health care protections, get America to universal coverage, and lower health care costs.'
b'Tune in as my campaign provides a post-election legal briefing. '
b'Beginning on January 20th, Vice President-elect Harris and I are going to do everything in our power to ease the burden of health care on you and your families.'
b'Today, the Trump Administration is in court, attempting to eliminate the Affordable Care Act. Tune in as I discuss how my administration will expand access to quality, affordable health care. '
b'.KamalaHarris and I arent wasting any time. Were ready to get COVID-19 under control so that we can reopen our businesses and schools safely, resume our lives, and put this pandemic behind us. '
b"I won't be president until January 20th, but my message today to everyone is this: wear a mask."
b'The bottom line: I will spare no effort to turn this pandemic around.'
b'The challenge before us right now is still immense and growing, and so is the need for bold action to fight this pandemic.'
b'My COVID-19 Transition Advisory Board will advise on detailed plans built on a bedrock of science, and that keep compassion, empathy, and care for every American at its core.'

b'Today, I have named a COVID-19 Transition Advisory Board, comprised of distinguished public health experts, to help our transition team translate the Biden-Harris COVID-19 plan into a blueprint we can put into place as soon as KamalaHarris and I are sworn into office.'
b"I spent the morning with the co-chairs of my COVID-19 Council discussing the status of this pandemic and how we move forward. Tune in as I provide an update on how we're going to beat this virus. "

b'A nation united.

A nation strengthened.

A nation healed.

The United States of America.'
b'With full hearts and steady hands, with faith in America and in each other, with a love of country  and a thirst for justice  let us be the nation that we know we can be.'
b'Tonight, the whole world is watching America. I believe at our best America is a beacon for the globe.\n\nAnd we lead not by the example of our power, but by the power of our example.'
b'Especially for those moments when this campaign was at its lowest  the African American community stood up again for me. They always have my back, and Ill have yours.'

b'I believe that this is part of the mandate from the American people. They want us to cooperate.\n\nThats the choice Ill make. And I call on the Congress  Democrats and Republicans alike  to make that choice with me.'

b'Now that the campaign is overwhat is the peoples will? What is our mandate?\n\nI believe it is this: Americans have called on us to marshal the forces of decency and the forces of fairness. To marshal the forces of science and the forces of hope in the great battles of our time.'

b'We cannot repair the economy, restore our vitality, or relish lifes most precious moments  hugging a grandchild, birthdays, weddings, graduations, all the moments that matter most to us  until we get this virus under control.'
b'The Bible tells us that to everything there is a season  a time to build, a time to reap, a time to sow. And a time to heal.\n\nThis is the time to heal in America.'

b'Its time to put away the harsh rhetoric.

To lower the temperature.

To see each other again.

To listen to each other again.'
b'To all those who volunteered, worked the polls in the middle of this pandemic, local election officials  you deserve a special thanks from this nation.'
b'For Americas educators, this is a great day: Youre going to have one of your own in the White House, and Jill is going to make a great First Lady.'

b'I pledge to be a President who seeks not to divide, but to unify.

Who doesnt see Red and Blue states, but a United States.

And who will work with all my heart to win the confidence of the whole people.'

b'Folks, the people of this nation have spoken.

They have delivered us a clear victory. A convincing victory.

A victory for We the People.'
b'A new day in America has come. Tune in as Vice President-Elect KamalaHarris and I address the nation. '

b'America, Im honored that you have chosen me to lead our great country.

The work ahead of us will be hard, but I promise you this: I will be a President for all Americans  whether you voted for me or not.

I will keep the faith that you have placed in me. '
b'We may be opponents  but we are not enemies. \n\nWe are Americans.'
b'We have to remember the purpose of our politics isnt totally unrelenting warfare.'
b'I know tensions can be high after a tough election like we just had.\n\nBut we need to remain calm. Patient. And let the process work out as we count all the votes.'

b'We are going to be the first Democrats to win Arizona in 24 years.

We are going to be the first Democrats to win Georgia in 28 years.

And we re-built the Blue Wall in the middle of the country that crumbled just four years ago.'

b'What is becoming clearer each hour is that record numbers of Americans  from all races, faiths, regions  chose change over more of the same. \n\nThey have given us a mandate for action on COVID and the economy and climate change and systemic racism.'
b"The numbers tell us a clear and convincing story: We're going to win this race."
b'Tune in as I address the nation on the current state of the race. '

b'Donald Trump is going to court to stop votes from being counted. We have assembled the largest election protection effort in history to fight back and need your help.\n\nChip in to make sure every vote is counted: '
b'No one is going to take our democracy away from us. Not now, not ever.\n\nAmerica has come too far, fought too many battles, and endured too much to let that happen.'
b'The people will not be silenced, be bullied, or surrender.\n\nEvery vote must be counted.'
b'I spent the afternoon attending briefings on the ongoing COVID-19 crisis and the state of the economy. Tune in as I provide an update on these briefings and efforts to count every vote. '
b'I ask people to stay calm. \nThe process is working. \nThe count is being completed.'

b'Democracy is sometimes messy, so sometimes it requires a little patience. \n\nBut that patience has been rewarded now for more than 240 years with a system of governance that has been the envy of the world.'
b'Were fighting to ensure every last vote is counted across the country  and we need your help to do it. Chip in to the Biden Fight Fund to fuel our election protection efforts: '
b'Let me be clear: I campaigned as a proud Democrat, but I will govern as an American president. '
b'Be patient, folks. Votes are being counted, and we feel good about where we are.'
b'As votes continue to be counted across the country, tune in as my campaign manager jomalleydillon and campaign adviser Bob Bauer give an update on where things stand. '

b'Donald Trump does not decide the outcome of this election and nor do I. The American people decide. Thats why weve launched the Biden Fight Fund  to ensure every vote is counted.\n\nChip in to help fund our election protection efforts across the country: '

b'Im confident that we will emerge victorious.

But this will not be my victory alone.

It will be a victory for the American people. '
b'Its clear that when the count is finished, we believe we will be the winners. '
b'Today, the Trump Administration officially left the Paris Climate Agreement. And in exactly 77 days, a Biden Administration will rejoin it. '
b'Keep faith in the process and in each other. Together, we will win this.'
b'I am confident we will emerge victorious, but this will not be my victory or our victory alone. It will be a victory for the American people, for our democracy, for America.'
b'To make progress, we have to stop treating our opponents as enemies. We are not enemies.'
b"Once this election is finalized and behind us, it will be time for us to do what we've always done as Americans: To put the harsh rhetoric of the campaign behind us."
b'Every vote must be counted. No one is going to take our democracy away from us, not now, not ever.'

b"The presidency, itself, is not a partisan institution. It's the one office in the nation that represents everyone and it demands a duty of care for all Americans, and that is precisely what I will do."
b"Power can't be taken or asserted, it flows from the people, and it's their will that determines who will be the President of the United States."

b'To make sure every vote is counted, were setting up the largest election protection effort ever assembled. Because Donald Trump doesnt get to decide the outcome of this election  the American people do.\n\nChip in to power the new Biden Fight Fund: '
b"We won't rest until everyone's vote is counted. Tune in as my campaign manager jomalleydillon and campaign adviser Bob Bauer give an update on where the race stands. "
b'We feel good about where we are. We believe we are on track to win this election.'
b"It's not my place or Donald Trump's place to declare the winner of this election. It's the voters' place."
b'Tune in as I speak to the nation live from Wilmington, Delaware. '
b'As polls begin to close in certain parts of the country, remember to stay in line. \n\nIf youre in line at your polling place before it closes, youre able to vote. '
b'Folks, time is running out to make your voice heard in this election. If you havent voted yet, go to  to find your polling place and head there as soon as you can.'

b'This is our moment to prove that:

Love is more powerful than hate.
Hope is more powerful than fear.
Light is more powerful than dark.

Vote before polls close: '

b"Who we are. What we stand for. Who we are going to be.

It's all at stake  and you have the power to determine the outcome.

Vote before polls close:  "

b'Today is your absolute last chance to vote in this election. If you havent voted early, I need you to vote today and stay in line as long as it takes. Our democracy is at stake. Go to  to find your polling location. '

b'This is our moment to choose:

Hope over fear.
Unity over division.
Science over fiction.
Truth over lies.

Vote: '
b'Votar es tu derecho. Si tienes alguna pregunta, llama a la l\xc3\xadnea directa de asistencia al votante al 1-866-296-8686. '

b'Every moment of the last four years comes down to today.

Dont miss your chance to make your voice heard.

Head to  to confirm your polling place and go vote before polls close.'

b'Where is your polling location?
When do polls close?
What do you need to bring to the polls?
Where can you drop off your absentee ballot?

Head to  to find all the information you need to make your voice heard today.'
b'Before he passed, John Lewis left us with marching orders.\n\nToday, we must carry them out:  '

b'We are in a battle for the soul of the nation.

And you have the ultimate power to determine the outcome: your vote. 

Use it. '
b'Many states have same-day voter registration. Head to  to see if your state allows you to register before voting today and make your voice heard.'

b'Folks, its go time.

Its time to restore the soul of this nation.

Its time to stand up and take our democracy back.

Its time to vote. '

b'Today, the American people will choose the next president. Tune in as my campaign manager jomalleydillon and campaign adviser Bob Bauer give another update on what you can expect as voting continues. '
b'Voting is your right. If you have questions, reach out to the Voter Assistance Hotline at 1-833-336-8683. '
b'As you head to the polls today, here are a few things to keep in mind. '

b'We can overcome these crises.

We can take our country back.

We can win the battle for the soul of the nation.

It all begins today. Confirm your polling place at  and go vote. Lets do this  together.'

b'In 2008 and 2012, you placed your trust in me to help lead this country alongside Barack Obama.

Today, Im asking for your trust once again  this time, in Kamala and me.

We can heal the soul of this nation  I promise we wont let you down.

 '

b'Im running as a proud Democrat, but I will govern as an American president.

I will work with Democrats and Republicans, and Ill work as hard for those who dont support me as for those who do.

Because thats the job of a president.'

b'Under President Trump:

- Over 230,000 Americans have died from COVID-19
- 30 million people have lost hours, paychecks, or jobs
- Nearly one in five small businesses have closed

Are you better off than you were four years ago?'

b'As president, I will:

 Rebuild our infrastructure
 Combat climate change
 Create millions of good-paying, union jobs

Its time to build back better  together. '
b'If we give Donald Trump another four years in the White House, our planet will never recover.'

b'Everybody knows who Donald Trump is.

Lets show them who we are.

We choose hope over fear. Unity over division. Science over fiction. And truth over lies.'
b'Los Dreamers son estadounidenses y ya es hora de que sea oficial.'
b'If we give Donald Trump another four years in the White House, he will forever alter the character of our nation.\n\nWe cant let that happen.'

b"I believe health care is a right for all.

Donald Trump believes it's a privilege for the few.

It's that simple, folks."
b"Tomorrow, let's send a clear message to Donald Trump: time to pack your bags and go home. "
b'I believe LGBTQ+ rights are human rights  and they are on the ballot tomorrow.\n\nVote:  '
b'Tomorrow is Election Day. I took a moment to reflect on some of my favorite stories and photos from the past year and a half.\n\nTake a look: '
b'Ive said it many times: Im more optimistic about Americas future today than I was when I got elected to the United States Senate as a 29-year-old.'
b'Young people have the power to own the outcome of this election.\n\nUse it:  '
b'Donald Trump will always fight for his wealthy and well-connected friends. Ill always fight for you.'
b'Who we are. What we believe. Who we want to be. Its all at stake tomorrow.\n\nVote. '
b"After tonight's horrific terrorist attack in Vienna, Austria, Jill and I are keeping the victims and their families in our prayers. We must all stand united against hate and violence."
b'President Trump ignored the pandemic playbook that President Obama and I left him, so we decided to bring it back out and go over what he missed. '
b'In less than 12 hours, voters will head to the polls for the most important election in our lifetimes. It all comes down to this. Join us for our final rally before Election Day. '

b'Donald Trump is the most corrupt president in modern history.

Donald Trump is the most racist president in modern history.

Donald Trump is the worst jobs president in modern history.

Why would we give him another four years?'
b'Heres the truth: Donald Trump inherited a growing economy from President Obama and me. And just like everything else hes inherited in life, he squandered it.'
b'Im speaking with members of the African American community in Pittsburgh about the power of the vote  and the future we can build together. Tune in. '
b'When America votes, America will be heard. And when America is heard, I believe the message is going to be loud and clear: Its time for Donald Trump to leave the White House.'

b'A Biden-Harris administration will:

- Implement nationwide mask mandates
- Ensure access to regular, reliable, and free testing
- Accelerate the development and distribution of safe and effective treatments and vaccines

We wont waste any time getting this virus under control.'

b'Health care. 
Civil rights.
Climate change. 
Economic inequality. 
Racial justice.
The Supreme Court.
Our democracy.

Theyre all at stake. Vote. '
b"Together, we're going to rebuild our economy. And when we do, we'll not only build it back  we'll build it back better."
b'You have the power to own the outcome of this election and determine the course of our country for generations to come.\n\nMake your plan to vote:  '

b'In public, President Trump compared COVID-19 to the flu and suggested people inject bleach to treat it.

In private, he told Bob Woodward it was deadlier than the flu and that he wanted to downplay it.

Its unthinkable.'

b'I have always believed you can define America in one word: possibilities. And I refuse to postpone those possibilities any longer.\n\nThere is so much we can achieve as a nation with Donald Trump out of the White House.'
b"I'm in Beaver County, Pennsylvania, to thank some of our incredible volunteers for all their hard work. Tune in  and then sign up to help:  "

b'Are you still undecided about who to vote for or know someone who is? My team put together some cheat sheets to show where Donald Trump and I stand on the issues to help you out. Take a look, and then share them with family and friends. '

b'We only get one opportunity to vote out Donald Trump  and we cant leave anything to chance.

Vote: 
Volunteer: 
Donate: 

Lets get the job done.'
b'Tune in as my campaign manager jomalleydillon and campaign adviser Bob Bauer discuss what to expect on Election Night. '
b'We have one shot. One opportunity. One moment.\n\nDont miss the chance  vote. '

b'Tomorrow, the American people get their say and will choose the next President. This afternoon, my campaign manager jomalleydillon and campaign adviser Bob Bauer will sit down to discuss what you can expect as the results come in. You can watch right here on Twitter at 1 PM ET. '
b"One day left  and we're leaving it all on the field. Tune in as we get out the vote in Cleveland. "
b'Were just one day away from the most important election of our lifetimes  and we need your help to get voters to the polls.\n\nSign up to volunteer today: '
b"Climate change isn't a hoax  it's a threat to millions of Americans like Velma and Amirah.\n\nWe have to vote out Donald Trump tomorrow and take urgent action to combat this crisis. "
b'This is my commitment to you: We will make sure every American has access to a free and safe COVID-19 vaccine.'

b'From climate change to racial justice  there is so much on the line in this election. So my team put together a generator to help you show your friends and family what youre voting for. Head to  to try it out.'

b'If you can still vote early, then vote early today.

If you havent returned your absentee ballot yet, then return it today.

If youre voting in-person tomorrow, then make your plan today.

Lets end this  today.'

b'My faith has been my anchor through highs and lows  a guiding light that taught me the values of honesty, decency, and treating others with respect.\n\nAs president, it will continue to serve as a source of strength. '
b'We need a president who actually listens to experts like Dr. Fauci.'
b'If I have the honor of being elected president, I will take care of your family like I would my own. '
b'I started this campaign saying we were in a battle for the soul of this nation  and I believe that even more deeply today.\n\nBut make no mistake: Its a battle we can and will win.'
b'Our president has failed in his most basic duty to this nation: to protect us.\n\nIts unforgivable.'

b"The hard truth is that our economy wasn't working for folks long before this crisis. It's why we can't just go back to the way things were  we have to build back better.\n\nHere's how we'll do it: "

b'Vote for respect.
Vote for decency.
Vote for truth.
Vote for leadership.

'
b'When you use your voice and vote, things can  and will  change for the better. '

b"Donald Trump sees the world from Park Avenue.

I see it from where I came from: Scranton, Pennsylvania. 

It's why I'll fight every day as president to make this country work for middle class and low-income Americans  not just the wealthy and well-connected."

b"No one fights harder for the people of Alabama than my friend, DougJones. He's a Senator with a big heart and he's never afraid to fight for what's right.\n\nDoug is in a tight race and needs your help to win on Tuesday. Chip in:  "

b'As president, Ill protect and build on Obamacare by: 

- Giving Americans the choice of a new public option
- Lowering premiums, deductibles, and co-pays
- Lowering the cost of prescription drugs

Learn more: '

b'The United States of America has emerged stronger from every trial and tribulation it has faced. And if we come together, follow the science, and keep faith with each other, we will once again. I promise.'
b'This is the most important election in our lifetimes  and you have the power to make all the difference.\n\nVote. '
b'2016 taught us to take nothing for granted and to leave everything on the field.\n\nVote:  '

b'When Donald Trump thinks about climate change, he thinks hoax. 

I think jobs.

We can solve our climate crisis and our economic crisis at the same time. Heres how: '

b"This is our moment to root out systemic racism and build a nation true to our founding ideals. A nation where all men and women are not only created equal  but treated equally. \n\nHere's how we'll advance racial economic equity: "
b'A more hopeful, united, and loving America is within our grasp  but we have to vote for it.\n\n '
b'Donald Trumps COVID-19 response has been the greatest failure of presidential leadership in our nations history.'
b'From Arizona to Georgia to Wisconsin and beyond  were working hard to earn every last vote. '
b'Under my tax plan, no one making under $400,000 will see their taxes go up.\n\nBut its time large corporations and the wealthiest Americans pay their fair share.'
b'I want to help restore hope in this country  and I have a bold vision for how, together, we can do that. '

b'Donald Trump is trying to eliminate the entire Affordable Care Act in the middle of a pandemic.

If he gets his way, more than 100 million Americans with pre-existing conditions could see their costs skyrocket or be denied coverage altogether.

We cant let him win. '
b'Its long past time President Trump and his wealthy friends paid their fair share in taxes.'
b"Scranton, Pennsylvania, isn't just where I'm from  it's the people I'm for. I'll fight every single day in the White House for the hardworking Americans who make our country run. "
b'Together, we can solve the crises were facing and win the battle for the soul of the nation. It all begins on Tuesday. Tune in as we get out the vote in Pennsylvania. '
b'Donald Trump claimed he would be "the greatest jobs president God ever created."\n\nInstead, he\'s on track to become the worst jobs president in 100 years.'
b'Dont let anyone tell you your voice wont count  because it will.\n\nMake sure your voice is heard. Go to  right now and make your plan to vote.'
b"Tune in as I join members of Philadelphia's faith community for a Souls to the Polls event. "

b'I believe climate change is an existential threat to humanity.

Donald Trump doesnt even think it exists.

Its that simple, folks.'

b'Its long past time we take action to end the scourge of gun violence in America.\n\nAs president, Ill ban assault weapons and high-capacity magazines, implement universal background checks, and enact other common-sense reforms to end our gun violence epidemic.'
b'More than 230,000 Americans have died from COVID-19  and Donald Trump has given up on trying to get the virus under control.\n\nHe may have quit on you, but I promise I never will.'
b'There are just two days until Election Day, and our campaign is working around the clock to get folks to vote.\n\nCan you chip in to help us reach every last voter before polls close on Tuesday? '
b"Health care is deeply personal to me  like it is for so many Americans. And I promise you that as president, I will protect your family's health care as if it were my own. "

b'We can build a future where:

- Health care is a right
- We end the gun violence epidemic
- We combat climate change
- Our government works for everyone

Vote. '

b"The Trump Administration knew how deadly this virus was back in February.

But they didn't tell you or your family. Instead, they gave a heads up to their friends on Wall Street so investors could make a profit before the recession hit.

They hid the truth. It's unforgivable."
b"I'm running as a proud Democrat, but I will govern as an American president. "
b'We need a president who believes in science and listens to someone other than himself.'
b'Folks, there are just three days left to vote in this election, and we need your help to get people to the polls. Text three friends or family members and make sure they have a plan to vote. '

b'Desde sus actos atroces con la separaci\xc3\xb3n de familias en nuestra frontera hasta su ignorancia con el pueblo puertorriqe\xc3\xb1o despu\xc3\xa9s del hurac\xc3\xa1n Mar\xc3\xada, el presidente Trump ha atacado la dignidad de las familias latinas una y otra vez.\n\nEsto terminar\xc3\xa1 cuando yo sea presidente.'

b'If youre sick or struggling or worried about how youll get through the day: I want you to know that I see you, and I wont forget you.\n\nYou can count on me to fight for you every day in the White House.'

b'From his heinous acts of separating families at our border to his neglect of the people of Puerto Rico after Hurricane Maria, President Trump has attacked the dignity of Latino families time and time again.\n\nIt will end when Im president.'
b'I promise you this: Ill end Donald Trumps chaos and end this crisis.'

b'My faith has been a source of immeasurable solace in times of grief and a daily inspiration to fight against the abuse of power in all its forms. As president, it will continue to serve as my anchor, as it has my entire life. '

b'Right now:
 
- Almost 23 million Americans are on unemployment
- Nearly 1 in 5 small businesses have closed their doors
- Millions of people are at risk of being evicted
 
We simply cant afford another four years of Donald Trump.'
b'Jodie  you have my word: I will always stand up for you and the millions of Americans with pre-existing conditions. '

b'We need to:

Build bridges, not walls.
Open our arms, not clench our fists.
Focus on the ties that bind us together, not tear each other apart.

We need to be what we are at our best: One America.'
b'We have in our hands the ultimate power: the power of the vote.\n\nDont let it go to waste. Make your plan to vote today. '
b'As president, Ill build an economy that rewards work  not just wealth.'

b'The WNBA and their players have been leading the way in protesting and activism for years.\n\nsportsiren and LaChinaRobinson join HoopStreams to share the latest. '

b'HoopStreams is live to discuss the unprecedented last 24 hours and counting in the sports world.

itsthebaldgirl, CassidyHubbarth and DarthAmin open the show.
'

b'In 2016, Kaepernick7 began kneeling during the national anthem as a form of protest against racial injustices in America.\n\nI am not going to stand up to show pride in a flag for a country that oppresses Black people and people of color. '
b'In 2016, MooreMaya and additional WNBA players started wearing Black Lives Matter t-shirts prior to WNBA games to protest police shootings throughout the country. '
b'After the police killing of Michael Brown in Ferguson, Missouri, Ariyana Smith walked onto her teams home court with her hands raised then fell to the floor for 4\xc2\xbd minutes. '
b'In 2003, Manhattanville College guard Toni Smith refused to look at the U.S. flag, protesting the countrys involvement in the war in Iraq. '
b'In 1996, Denver Nuggets guard Mahmoud Adul-Rauf decided to stop standing for the national anthem. Abdul-Rauf voiced that he saw the flag as a symbol of oppression, of tyranny. '

b'In 1992, former US Open Champion Arthur Ashe joined a demonstration supporting the equal treatment of Haitians and African-Americans.\n\nAfter Ashes passing, former Detroit Pistons center, OldenPolynice1 followed in his footsteps and continued to spread the message. '
b'In 1989, Hall of Fame coach John Thompson protested a new academic eligibility rule that he believed targeted African-American athletes, denying them of scholarships. '

b'The Syracuse 8 chose to sit out the 1970 college football season in an effort to bring racial equality to the athletic program.

The group demanded:
Better healthcare
Academic support
Fair intra-squad competition
Diversity on the coaching staff '
b'Tommie Smith and John Carlos took a stand against racism and discrimination, wearing black gloves while raising their fists during their 200-meter medal ceremony at the 1968 Olympics. '
b'Prominent Black athletes came together in support of Muhammad Ali, who refused to join the U.S. Army in 1967.\n\nAthletes at the table included: Jim Brown, Bill Russell, Lew Alcindor and more. '

b'Four-time national champion Alice Marble wrote a letter that rocked the tennis world when she advocated for African-American competitor Althea Gibson to be allowed to compete in the US Open.\n\nIn 1950, Gibson became the first Black woman to do so. '
b'Brooklyn Dodgers General Manager Branch Rickey ignores the norm and breaks the race barrier by signing Negro League star, Jackie Robinson. '

b'In 1940, football players at New York University stood in solidarity with fullback Leonard Bates after an NYU coach accepted the request of an opposing team to not use Bates in a game because of the color of his skin. '
b'After Chicago White Soxs Cap Anson demanded Moses Walker, an African-American, not play, Toledo manager Charlie Morton took a stand, called his bluff and started Walker in right field. '

b'From Ali to Maya Moore, Bill Russell to Colin Kaepernick, athletes have consistently used their platform to spotlight injustices.\n\nHere is a look at moments where athletes did not simply stick to sports:'
b'Civil rights activist and NBA legend Bill Russell is happy to see this generation of players take a stand, similar to his 1961 boycott.\n\n(via RealBillRussell) '

b'As the NBA continues to navigate its next steps following the Bucks decision to boycott their playoff game over issues of social justice, a recognizable figure has emerged as a go-between the NBA players and the owners: \n\nMichael Jordan. '
b"What we saw yesterday was unlike anything we've seen in recent sports memory, but there is a long history of boycotts in sports, often related to racial injustice.\n\n(via OTLonESPN) "
b'The NHL will not play any playoff games Thursday in solidarity with other leagues protesting the recent police shooting of Jacob Blake in Wisconsin, sources told emilymkaplan. '
b'Real Salt Lake owner Dell Loy Hansen said players\' boycott of games on Wednesday took "a lot of wind out of my sails" when it comes to investing in the team.  '
b"Jacob Blake was shot by police on Sunday, Aug. 23. Three days later, athletes from four different leagues boycotted games.\n\nHere's everything that led to Wednesday night. "
b"NBA players have decided to resume the playoffs, a source tells wojespn.\n\nThursday's three playoff games will be postponed.  "

b'"This is just the tipping of the iceberg."

b"Clayton Kershaw and the Dodgers showed support for their Black teammates by sitting out of Wednesday night's game. "

b'Its easy to get worn down and think its never going to change; its never going to grow. No, get your second wind. Your due season is closer than you think.'

b'What youre up against may be bigger, more powerful, more influential, but you and God are a majority. Him being for you is more than the world being against you. Theres not an obstacle He cant move. Theres not a sickness He cant heal, an addiction He cant free you from.'

b'Dont let the circumstances fool you. Surely, God is about to bless you and show you favor that youve never seen.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "Overflow With Hope". Check it out here:  '

b'You may feel like theres no reason to have hope. In the natural, its not possible. But we serve a supernatural God. When you keep hoping on in faith, you are paving the way for God to do extraordinary things.'
b'God doesnt ask us to figure it out. He doesnt ask us to come up with a plan, research it, see if its possible. He simply asks us to believe. Get in agreement with what God has already promised.'

b'If you empty out the worry, God will fill you with peace.

Get a copy of Joels NEW book Empty Out The Negative for you and a friend here: 

EmptyOutTheNegativeBook
JoelOsteen '
b'No person can stop Him, no sickness, no bad break, no addiction. What are you considering? How big your problems are or how great your God is?\n\nClick here to watch, "Overflow With Hope":  '

b'When you go through a disappointment, you could be upset, bitter, but when you overflow with hope, you know that what was meant for harm, God is turning to your advantage. Weeping may endure for a night, but you know joy is coming.'
b'God wouldnt have given you the promise, He wouldnt have put that dream in your heart, if He didnt have a way to make it happen.'
b'You have to dig down deep and against all hope, hope on in faith. Against the odds, dare to believe.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "Overflow With Hope":  '

b'Are you looking at how big your obstacles are, or are you looking at how big your God is? Your situation may seem impossible, like it could never work out, but one touch of Gods favor, one good break, one healing, meeting one right person, and everything will change.'
b'God wouldnt have given you that dream, He wouldnt have put that promise in your heart, if He didnt have a way to make it happen.\n\nTune into Joels new message today! "Overflow With Hope"   '

b'Its easy to doubt; its easy to give up on dreams. Doubters are a dime a dozen. God is looking for people that have a made-up mind, people that are convinced, people that overflow with hope, people that believe when the odds are against them, when they dont see a way.'

b'When you overflow with hope, youre not moved by what the circumstances look like. Youre not discouraged because it hasnt happened yet. Youre not worried because you dont see a way. You know God is on the throne.'
b'You have to be mature enough to know when to resist and when to rest. Youre not supposed to fight every battle. God uses betrayals, closed doors, disappointments to move you into your purpose.'

b'You cant think defeat and have victory. You cant think weakness and have strength. Your life is going to follow your thoughts.

Get a copy of Joels NEW book Empty Out The Negative for you and a friend: 

EmptyOutTheNegativeBook
JoelOsteen '
b'God knows what Hes doing. He has you in the palm of His hand. He may not do it the way you had planned, but where Hes taking you is better than youve imagined.'

b'God is not finished. He wouldnt have let you get in that difficulty if He wasnt going to bring you out. Suddenly the waters will part, suddenly the winds will shift in your favor, suddenly the opposition will go away, suddenly the right people will show up.'
b'Unclutter your mind. Living guilty is not your destiny. Going around down on yourself, thinking your problems are too big, that is not who you were created to be.'

b'Quit remembering what God has forgotten. Quit telling Him how bad you are, how you messed up, and how you lost your temper. He forgave you way back when you asked. Start receiving Gods mercy. Mercy covers your mistakes.'

b'Take inventory of what youre giving space to. Life is too short for you to live with negative things holding you down.

b'Dont release the dream, dont give up on the promise, but release control of how God is going to bring it to pass.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Letting Go Of Control" from Joel!   '
b'Worry doesnt look good on you. Being offended, stressed, jealous, thats not youre style. Clear out the clutter and youll step into new levels.'

b"Don't try to understand everything that happens along the way. God works in mysterious ways. If youre trying to figure everything out, youre going to get frustrated. There are things youre not supposed to understand; thats what faith is all about."
b'We honor all of our faithful Veterans. Thank you for your service to our country. GodBlessAmerica '

b'If it hasnt happened yet, then it wasnt meant to be. Instead of fighting where you are, why dont you embrace where you are?\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "Letting Go Of Control". Check it out here:  '
b'Your time is too valuable to live offended, upset. Life is flying by. We can never get this day back. Live it in peace; live it in faith.'

b'Anything you must have to be happy, the enemy can use it against you. When you can say, God, this is what I want, but even if it doesnt work out my way, Im still going to be happy. That takes away the power of the enemy.'

b'You werent created to carry around guilt, regret, bitterness, anger. You have to release it. When you do, youll not only feel a new freedom, but God will be your vindicator.\n\nJoels NEW book EmptyOutTheNegativeBook is out today!  '

b'If youre trying to control the outcome and control the timeframe, then youre going to live worried. You have to release control. Release having to have it happen your way.\n\nClick here to watch, "Letting Go Of Control":  '
b'When youre at rest, youre in faith.  When youre at rest, you know Gods in control, you know all things are going to work for your good, you know that what He started He will finish.'
b'If that adversity were going to stop your destiny, God wouldnt have allowed it. If that disappointment were going to keep you from your purpose, it wouldnt have happened.'

b'God doesnt always take us down a straight path. There will be detours, delays, times where you feel like youre going the wrong way.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "Letting Go Of Control":  '
b'Dont put your happiness on hold until everything works out. This day is a gift. Enjoy your life while God is working.'

b'Gods ways are not our ways. Hes working when we cant see it. Sometimes its taking longer because He has something better in store. One of the best things Ive learned is to trust Gods timing and trust His ways.'
b'You have to release the worry, release the frustration, release having to figure it out. Come back to a place of peace.\n\nCheck out "Letting Go Of Control" on Podcast here!  '
b'It may be impossible to you, but its not to our God. Start expecting His favor. Start believing that new levels are coming. Start talking like its going to happen.'

b'Quit being discouraged over what didnt work out. It feels like you failed, but thats not the end of your story. God led you into the desert. Youre in a time of testing. Theres something bigger God has in your future.'
b'Heres a key, God doesnt define you by your mistakes; He refines you by your mistakes. He uses the failures, the times we blow it, the times we go the wrong way, to do a work in us.'
b'You dont have to be perfect; weve all made mistakes. Its not so much about your performance; its about your heart.\n\nCheck out "Your Time to Reign" on Podcast here!  '

b'What youre up against may be difficult, but this is a new day. God is about to lighten the load. Things are about to change in your favor. Youre going to feel a strength that youve never felt, a grace to do what you couldnt do, an anointing of ease.'

b'No matter what you go through, because youre a child of the Most High God, theres going to be green grass in the desert. Hes going to give you strength that you cant explain, courage that you didnt know you had, favor that you didnt see coming.'

b'If you empty out the insecurity and the negative things people have said about you, God will fill you with confidence.

b'In the drought, in the pandemic, youre going to see God show out in your life. Thats what it means to have grass in the desert. You cant explain it; it doesnt make sense. Its just the goodness of God.'
b'Pay attention to what youre allowing in your spirit. Just because theres strife and division, that doesnt mean it has to get in you. Stay on the high road. Dont take that bait.'

b'You may wonder how youre going to accomplish your dreams, get out of that difficulty. God has the right people lined up. He knows how to put you at the right place. Hes going to make things happen that you never imagined. Hes the God who exceeds expectations.'

b'God never said we wouldnt have a time of trouble. But He did promise, if youll just stand, Hell bring you out, Hell defeat your enemies, Hell give you beauty for ashes.  \n\nCheck out "The Hot Winds of Testing" on Podcast here!  '
b'Do yourself a favor, remove the negative labels and put on what God says about you: redeemed, forgiven, blessed, prosperous, qualified, victorious.'
b"Dont wilt in trouble; dig down deep. Its not too much for you. You can handle it. Youve been armed with strength for this battle.\n\nDon't miss this powerful message from Joel!   "

b'You may have failed, but youre not a failure. That was a moment in your life; that was one season. It doesnt determine your future. Dont let that mistake define you.'

b'Dont get discouraged over what God is bringing you through. He wont allow you to get in a difficulty that He cant bring you out of.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "The Hot Winds of Testing". Check it out here:  '

b'That difficulty is not there to defeat you; its there to promote you. If youll pass the test, keep doing the right thing, keep being good to people, keep letting God fight your battles, God will not only turn it around, but Hell bring you out better.'

b'If youll stand immovable, unshakable, then you will be unstoppable. The winds of testing will not keep you from your destiny; it will launch you into your destiny.\n\nClick here to watch this new message from Joel:  '

b'God is looking for people, not necessarily that have great faith, but people that will simply stand. Stand in the middle of a pandemic, not bitter, not discouraged, but stand with an attitude of faith.'

b'Pay attention to what your mind is dwelling on. Dont just think any thought that comes to mind. If its a negative, discouraging, fearful thought, dont give it the time of day.

b'There may be something you know God has put in your heart, but if it happens too soon and youre not prepared, that blessing will turn into a burden. A good father wont give a good gift at the wrong time.'

b'Dont be impatient for God to act. God is working. Youre in the waiting room. Youre being prepared for what God has prepared for you.\n\nTune in to this powerful message, "It\'s Worth the Wait" from Joel!   '

b'You are well able. No weapon formed against you will prosper. That difficulty didnt come to stay; it came to pass. Be strong and of good courage for the Lord your God is with you.'

b'God calls us what we are before it happens. He knows whats in us. Hes the one that put in us the potential, the gifts, the talents.\n\nCheck out "Who Do You Say You Are?" on Podcast here!  '

b'Trust Him when you dont understand; be comfortable not knowing. The scripture says, Lean not to your own understanding.'

b'God is not asking you to figure it out; Hes just asking you to believe. Not only believe in Him, but believe in who He created you to be.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Who Do You Say You Are?" from Joel!   '

b'Whats trying to stop you doesnt have a chance. God being for you is more than the world being against you.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "Who Do You Say You Are?". Check it out here:  '

b'Who do you say you are: average, limited, disadvantaged, not able to? That will keep you from your destiny. Instead of letting people define you, instead of letting your past label you, why dont you go back to what God says about you. Hes the one that made you.'

b'You cant say Im weak and tap into the power. You cant say Ill never get ahead and tap into the abundance. You cant say Im not talented and tap into your greatness. \n\nClick here to watch, "Who Do You Say You Are?":  '

b'The enemy is called the accuser. Hell remind you of every mistake youve made, every time youve failed. Hed love for you to wear negative labels: unworthy, washed up, no future. Dont wear those labels. Say what God says about you, Im forgiven, Im redeemed, Im restored.'
b'God didnt make anyone average. Nobody has your fingerprints; nobody can do what you can do. But as long as you believe youre ordinary, you wont shine like youre supposed to shine.'
b'Hold your head up high and step up to who you were created to be.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "Who Do You Say You Are?":  '

b'You are not who people say you are; you are who God says you are. People cant always see what God put in you; they cant see the potential, the gifts, the greatness. Dont let people put their limitations on you and convince you that you cant accomplish your dream.'

b'You dont know where God is taking you. You dont know the doors Hes going to open, the giants youre going to defeat, the influence youre going to have. Theres an awesome future in front of you, but its dependent on how you see yourself.'
b'The only voice that matters is your voice. Who do you say you are?  What you say is what you will become.\n\nTune into Joels new message today! "Who Do You Say You Are?"   '

b'Instead of letting people define you, instead of letting circumstances label you, you need to go back to what God said about you. God says, You can do all things through Christ. Youre equipped and empowered.'

b'Youre not on your own. The Creator of the universe is working out His plan for your life. His job is to open doors we cant open, His job is to part Red Seas, His job is to make things happen that we cant make happen.'

b'God rewards faithful people: people that dont give up, people that dont let a disappointment cause them to be sour, people that dont let a setback, a loss, a delay stop their destiny.\n\nCheck out "Travel Steadily" on Podcast here!  '

b'Dont get discouraged by whats not changing. Instead, let that challenge you to call it in even stronger. God is faithful to what He promised. When youre calling in what He has spoken over you, then you can rest assured its on the way.'

b'If you dont do it for yourself, do it for those that went before you. They handed you the baton. All of their sacrifices have put us much further down the road. The way to honor their legacy is to go further, to dream big.'

b'God doesnt ask us to figure everything out. You have to know whats your job and whats Gods job. Our job is to believe, our job is to thank God, our job is to walk in obedience.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Travel Steadily" from Joel!   '

b'You are not a sick person trying to get well; youre a well person fighting off sickness. Youre not an addicted person trying to get free; youre a free person fighting off addictions. It may be there now, but its in the process of leaving.'
b'That obstacle may look big, that giant may look impossible, but God can do the impossible. Now, stay encouraged. You can defeat your giants.'

b'If youre going to go from anointed to appointed, you have to keep thanking God when you dont see anything happening, praising when you could be complaining. \n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "Travel Steadily". Check it out here:  '

b'Its not enough to just hope something will happen, just believe a dream will come to pass, just think positive and that situation will turn around. You have to take the next step and call it in. Words give life to our faith.'

b'The key is to not be impatient. It may not happen as fast as you would like. While youre waiting, thats a test. Show God that youre not going to give up on your dream, youre not going to let what didnt work out cause you to lose your passion.'

b'When God gives you a promise, there will always be a waiting period. What we do while were waiting will determine whether the promise will come to pass.\n\nClick here to watch, "Travel Steadily":  '

b'Nothing that has happened to you is a surprise to God. Hes ordering your steps. If the door closed, it was supposed to close. If the person walked away, they were supposed to walk away. Dont get bitter; keep traveling steadily.'
b'Sometimes the reason its taking so long is because what God has for you is bigger than youve imagined. Hes getting you prepared to carry the weight of the blessing, the weight of the influence.'
b'Your increase, your favor, your abundance is not in where youve been; its where God is taking you.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "Travel Steadily":  '

b'To see promises come to pass, you have to keep traveling steadily. You have to do the right thing when nobody is watching; you have to be your best when youre not getting the credit; you have to thank God even though doors arent opening.'

b'God never promised things would turn around instantly and come to pass in two weeks. Sometimes, there will be a waiting period. Dont be impatient; God rewards faithful people that keep doing the right thing.'

b'Everything may not be perfect, youre dealing with challenges, but youre consistently thanking God, consistently declaring His promises, consistently expecting His favor. Thats what it means to travel steadily.'

b'As long as youre worried, trying to make things happen in your own strength, that will limit what God will do. The Psalmist said, Be still and know that He is God. Clear out the worry, clear out the offense, clear out the negativity.'

b'God has already given you an assignment, Hes already called you, and Hes not going to change His mind. You may make mistakes, get off course, do things that you know you shouldnt, but that doesnt change your calling.'

b'God wants to make you an example of His goodness. When He exceeds your expectations, people are going to take notice. Theyre going to see the favor on your life. Youre going to have a new respect, a new level of influence.'
b'Life is short; time is flying by. You have to make a decision. Are you going to stay comfortable or are you going to step into your calling?\n\nCheck out "Calling Over Comfort" on Podcast here!  '
b'You cant hold on to the hurts, live offended, bitter, and see the new things God has in store. You have to clear out the clutter; thats what makes room for God to give you the beauty.'

b"You dont have to know how it's going to happen as long as you know Who is in control of your life. Thats when the Creator of the universe will open doors you couldnt open, break chains that have held you back, bring dreams to pass that seemed impossible."
b'Heres the key, if you never try, youre never going to know. There are no risks in playing it safe.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Calling Over Comfort" from Joel!   '

b'God knew there would be times we wouldnt have the faith we need to reach our destiny. But God said, If youll just have a little bit of faith, thats all you need. Then, Ill do my part. Ill exceed your expectations.'

b'When you go through a disappointment, something doesnt work out, you can hold on to it and live discouraged, or you can let it go and say, God, I know You have something better. I know Your plans for me are for good.'

b'The fear may still be there, but you have to act on your purpose and not your fear. Fear will keep you from your destiny. You may feel fear, but you have to do it afraid. Be inspired by this message from Joel, "Calling Over Comfort".\n\nCheck it out here:  '

b'Sometimes we think its a lack of faith to say, I dont know. We think we have to have all the answers, have it all figured out. Take the pressure off. You dont have to know; God knows. He has you in the palm of His hand. Hes directing your steps.'

b'We all have destiny moments. That opportunity is not going to pass by again. If you let fear keep you in your comfort zone, people didnt stop your destiny; you stopped your destiny. Im asking you to choose your calling over your comfort.'

b'Dont let the comfort keep you from the calling. Where God is taking you is going to require risks. Youre going to have to leave whats familiar and step into the unknown.\n\nClick here to watch, "Calling Over Comfort":  '

b'The reason you feel that stirring in your spirit, the reason something is coming alive on the inside, is because God is calling you. Hes been waiting for you. This is a destiny moment. The question is, will you leave your comfort and step into your calling?'

b'You can be at the right place, in the wrong frame of mind, and miss your miracle. \n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "Calling Over Comfort":  '
b'Dont let fear hold you back: fear of what people are going to think. If theyre not for you, then you dont need them. Your destiny is not dependent on everyone being for you.'

b'Anytime God is going to do something new in your life, give you more influence, more favor, more anointing, more resources, theres going to be a test of being uncomfortable. Are you willing to stretch, to do something youve never done?'
b'If youre never uncomfortable, youre not growing. If you never have to stretch your faith, then youre going to be limited.\n\nTune into Joels new message today! "Calling Over Comfort"   '

b'Are you going to choose to stay comfortable, or are you going to step out in faith and take a risk? If youll leave the comfort and come into your calling, God will make things happen that you couldnt make happen. Doors will open that you couldnt open.'
b'Quit telling yourself, I cant do this. Its too early; its too hard. Ive had too many setbacks. You can do what you want to do. Dont miss your destiny because you didnt want it bad enough.'

b'God has not failed in the past; Hes not going to start with you. Keep on walking, believing, praying, doing the right thing. Waters are about to part, doors are about to open, problems are about to turn around.'
b'The scripture says, Faith without works is dead. You have to go after what God has for you.'
b'God being for you doesnt mean you wont have opposition. The enemy wouldnt be trying to stop you if you werent a threat to him.\n\nCheck out "Keep on Walking" on Podcast here!  '
b'You are made in the image of Almighty God. He calls you a masterpiece. You have something to offer that nobody else has.'

b'When the odds are against you and you dont see how it could work out, dont get discouraged. Remind yourself: tomorrow will be better than today. Thats not just being positive. The scripture says, The path of the righteous gets brighter and brighter.'

b'Things youve been standing in faith for are about to come to pass. Its not going to be ordinary; its going to be the hand of God.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Keep on Walking" from Joel!   '

Call in courage.

b'You have to believe it before you see it. You have to act like its on the way when you dont see any sign of it.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "Keep on Walking":  '

b'Dont let the enemy talk you out of your Promised Land. God has bigger things in your future. He has new mountains for you to climb.'

b'Just because you dont see anything doesnt mean God is not working. As you keep believing, keep praising, keep doing the right thing, youre going to see things begin to change. Many times the miracle is in the process. What youre believing for is still on the way.'

b'Declare your healing. Declare your freedom. Declare your dreams are coming to pass. Jesus said, If you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mountain move and it will move. Nothing will be impossible for you.'
b'You could live worried, upset, but no. Be still and know that He is God. You dont have to be God. You dont have to figure it out. You dont have to come up with the solution. God is on the throne.'

b'We remember and honor all those who lost their lives, their loved ones, and those who fought to save lives with courage on September 11, 2001. '

b'Are you living worried, discouraged, fearful? Thats taking up space for the good things that belong to you. In this new book, Joel shows you how to empty out the negative so you can have better relationships, greater joy, more creativity and live your best life. '
b'Gods ways are not our ways. Sometimes He doesnt want you to know. Its a test of your faith. Will you trust Him or will you live worried, stressed, wondering how its going to work out?'

b"Get in agreement with God. He can give you light without sun, water without rain, healing without a sourcewherein the natural, theres no explanation.\n\nDon't miss this powerful message from Joel!   "
b'God is so merciful, even when we dont have the faith, even when we think weve reached our limits, God says, Thats okay. Im going to show you My favor in spite of that.'

b'You werent created to live worried, guilty, upset, bitter. If youre going to reach your destiny, you have to clear out the clutter. You cant stop negative things from coming, but you can keep them from staying. You dont have to hold on to it.'
b'You have to talk like its already happened. There may not be any sign of it, but that is what faith is all about.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel. Check it out here:  '

b'You may have some things you dont understand, you cant figure out, you dont see an answer. Thats okay. You dont have to see it. Dont get discouraged; dont start complaining. God is working behind the scenes.'

b'Declare your vision in spite of what the experts are telling you. People dont determine your destiny. They dont know what God put in you. Dont let their negative words keep you from speaking your positive, faith-filled words.'
b'If you keep speaking it, you will become what youre saying. You are prophesying your future. Listen to the words coming out of your mouth.'
b'Its not enough to just believe you have favor, believe that youre blessed, believe that youre going to fulfill your dreams. The scripture says the spirit of faith is in our words.'
b'Words are like seeds. Every time you say them, theyre taking root, theyre growing. The scripture says, You will eat the fruit of your words.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel:  '
b'You cant speak defeat and have victory. You cant speak lack and have abundance. You cant speak sickness and have health. Get in the habit of speaking faith-filled words.'

b'God has spoken promises to your spirit that may seem too big, impossible. You dont have the connections, the experience, the funds. Dont talk yourself out of the miracle. Get in agreement with God. Dare to declare what He put in your heart.'
b'Our words have creative power. When we speak something out, were giving it the right to come to pass.\n\nTune into Joels new message today!   '

b'We give life to whatever we speak out. If you start speaking negative, agreeing with the doubt, talking about how big the problem is, then youre giving life to the wrong things. Your words can keep you from your destiny.'

b'You may have had some setbacks, things didnt work out, but you have to be relentless when it comes to what God put in your heart. If you let people, a closed door, or a delay talk you out of it, then you didnt want it bad enough.'
b'When you believe that God wants to show out in your life, when you have the boldness to ask, then God will display His awesome power through you, and other people will notice.'
b'Stay faithful where you are; keep a good attitude when things are not happening as fast as you would like. David said, God, my times are in Your hands.'
b'God knew we would make mistakes. Hes not going to just redeem you; Hes going to redeem the time. Hes going to give you another chance.\n\nCheck out "Time Is On Your Side" on Podcast here!  '

b'You dont have time to waste with people that bring out the worst in you. Life is flying by. We dont get a do-over. This is it. What if I hurt their feelings? What if you miss your destiny? What if they keep you from becoming all you were created to be?'
b'Pray from a place of victory, pray from a place of confidence, not begging God, not trying to convince Him, but thanking Him for what Hes already promised.'

b'The truth is that what God has for you is still on the way. Those years you were dealing with depression, the joy that should have been yours is still coming.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Time Is On Your Side" from Joel!   '
b'If youre overwhelmed by problems, and you let circumstances push you down and people talk you out of it, then youre not going to have the courage and strength to sustain where God is taking you.'

b'The dreams God put in your heart, the promises Hes spoken to you are not going to come to pass without opposition, delays, people trying to talk you out of it. If youre going to reach your destiny, you have to have a made-up mind.'

b'Nothing can stand against our God. When He comes down to deliver you, all the forces of darkness cannot stop Him.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "Time Is On Your Side". Check it out here:  '
b'We think of waiting as negative: we dont like it, nothing is happening. Were interested in the destination, but God is interested in the journey. Hes working on us along the way.'

b'God sees the years youve lost. He knows the pain, the hurt, what wasnt fair. The beauty of our God is He doesnt just heal the wounds; He restores the years. He makes up for what wasnt fair.\n\nClick here to watch, "Time Is On Your Side":  '

b'We all want to rise higher, accomplish dreams, overcome obstacles, but as long as were only focused on ourselves, well get stuck. God brings people and opportunities across our path so we can be a blessing.'

b'This is your chance to step up to a new level, your chance to break the addiction, to make your marriage great. God is going to cause you to accomplish more in less time. This is a window where God is going to give you the opportunity to finish what you started.'

b'It may feel like youre running out of time, but God wouldnt have planned out your days, He wouldnt have given you a destiny and then not given you the time to fulfill it.'

b'All those years you prayed, those years you believed, those years you did the right thing, you worked hard, you helped others; that harvest has been stored up.\n\nTune into Joels new message today! "Time Is On Your Side"   '
b'Its said that time is the one thing that we cant get back. Thats true in the natural, but we serve a supernatural God. He knows how to make up for lost time.'
b'Too often, were fighting when we should be resting. Were standing when we should be sitting. You need to have faith that God is in control.'
b'Sometimes were waiting on God to bring us up higher, but God is waiting for us to bring our thinking up higher. Dont reduce what God put in your spirit to fit your faith; stretch your faith.'

b'After all God has done, handpicked you for this time, put His DNA in you, crowned you with His favor, dont go through life thinking youre ordinary.\n\nCheck out "You Are Good Seed" on Podcast here!  '

b'Its very freeing when you learn this principle: there are some things were not supposed to know. Thats not a lack of faith; its just the opposite. Youre taking yourself off the throne and putting God on the throne.'

b'It may take a little time to see it come to pass, but its on the way. Dont get talked out of it. Dont let whats not happening discourage you. Keep believing, keep thanking God, and youre going to see what God has spoken over your life.'
b'We all face challenges in life. The key is to rise above the turmoil. Dont let it get on the inside. Remain at rest. Keep your seat and God will fight your battles.'
b'Quit being discouraged by what you see. What you see is subject to change. You dont know what God is up to. You dont know what Hes doing behind the scenes.'

b'The promise God put in you is not going to come through someone else. God didnt create you to be dependent on others to fulfill your destiny. There is greatness in you. There are gifts, talents, businesses.'
b'Youre about to blossom in an amazing way. You wouldnt have that difficulty if God werent about to do something awesome in your life.\n\nClick here to watch, "You Are Good Seed":  '

b'Sometimes life stinks. We think these negative circumstances are going to stop us, but have a new perspective: its fertilizer. Its not working against you; its working for you.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "You Are Good Seed":  '
b'It may be uncomfortable, but its developing your character. Its giving you endurance. Its getting you prepared to blossom, in position to see the greatness of God.'

b'Dont let the accuser convince you that youve blown it too many times, that you dont measure up. God is saying to you today, Ive approved you. My hand of favor is on you. I have forgiveness for your mistakes, mercy for your failures, favor for your future.'

b'Recognize His goodness in your life. Remember how He led you through the desert, how you met that person, how He brought you out of that problem, how He opened that door. It wasnt a lucky break; it was the Lord your God.'

b'One of the saddest things is to come to the end of life and wonder what we could have become. You can start today. Theres still time. You can still become who God created you to be. The question is, do you want it bad enough?'
b'Dont be impatient for God to act. Dont be frustrated by whats not happening. God is working. Youre in the waiting room. Youre being prepared for what God has prepared for you.'

b'There are promises you need to activate. The promise on its own wont do you any good. Its just a hopeful statement. It needs another ingredient: your faith.\n\nCheck out "Mix Your Faith" on Podcast here!  '

b'When God sees you doing all that you can, then Hell make things happen that you cant. But if youre not willing to do the natural, Hes not going to do the supernatural.'

b'Are you letting people talk you out of what God put in your heart? Do yourself a favor and ignore what theyre telling you. Let that go in one ear and out the other. They dont determine your destiny; God does.'

b'When you believe, angels go to work. When you believe, supernatural doors will open. When you believe, youll defeat giants. When you believe, youll accomplish dreams much bigger than you thought.'

b'When you mix your faith with the promises, powerful things happen. A little match can start a huge fire. A little faith can start a huge blessing.\n\nLittle faith can open big doors. Click here to watch, "Mix Your Faith":  '

b'Little faith can defeat great giants. Little faith can open big doors. Dont believe that you dont have enough faith. You have the faith you need to get you to your destiny. Now do your part and start mixing faith with the promises.'

b'God has given us powerful promises in the scripture. But, as powerful as these promises are, as encouraging and inspiring as they can be, theres only one ingredient that activates the power, one ingredient that ignites what God said, and thats faith.'
b'There are a lot of things in life we cant change, but we can change our approach. We can choose to not let things upset us, not go through life worried, frustrated, discouraged.'

b'You have to change your focus from what you see to what God said. You have to walk by faith and not by sight.\n\nCheck out "Remember What God Said" on Podcast here!  '

b'Dont waste your time worrying; God is on the throne. Hes promised to work out His plan for your life. His plan is better than your plan.'

b'When life is stressfulyou have a setback in your finances, youre struggling with depressiondont let those negative thoughts drown out what God promised.\n\nListen to this powerful message, "Remember What God Said" from Joel!   '

b'When you remember what God said, you wont be worried; youll have peace in the midst of the storm. Youll have faith to believe for the impossible.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "Remember What God Said". Check it out here:  '

b'The economy is not your source; God is your source. Youre connected to a supply line that will never run dry.\n\nClick here to watch, "Remember What God Said":  '

b'Why dont you start thanking God for what He told you instead of letting the negative thoughts play? The reason were sometimes discouraged is weve forgotten what Hes said. Its not complicated. Go back to His promises.'

b'Quit dwelling on the hurts and start dwelling on what God promised you. God is saying, Did not I tell you, I will give you beauty for those ashes. Did not I tell you that I will pay you back double for the unfair things that have happened?'
b'Thank Him that Hes making a way where you dont see a way. Thank Him that He always causes you to triumph.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "Remember What God Said":  '

b'Dont focus on the winds, the waves, the impossibilities. Focus on what God said. Let His promises play in your mind. The dream that He put in your heart, every day, thank Him for it. Dare to believe that its on the way.'

b'When were under pressure, the mistake we often make is we go by what we see instead of by what God said. As long as you go by what you see, youre going to be worried and stressed. You have to start going by what God said.'

b'What youre up against may seem impossible, but God created you to defy the odds. He created you to go further than people say you can go. He created you to defeat giants.'

b'God doesnt expect you to be strong all the time. He understands there will be times that we get weary. The good news is He doesnt fault us for feeling weak. The scripture says, When you are weak, He is strong.'

b'When you help someone else shine, God is going to make sure that you shine. As you help others rise higher, God is going to help you rise higher. Youre sowing a seed for where you want to go.'
