b'Great joy is coming, great favor, great relationships, great health. The enemy thought he was stopping you, but he didnt realize he was setting you up.\n\nCheck out "The Shaking is for Shifting" on Podcast here!  '
b'Gods about to show out in your life. Hes about to do something unprecedented, out of the ordinary. Get ready for new ground. Get ready to go where you couldnt go on your own.'
b'God is about to display awesome power through you. He could display it through anything, through creation, through nature, through the weather, but He said Hes going to display it through you.'

b'Many times a great shaking precedes great favor. Great difficulty precedes great promotion. Great opposition precedes great influence.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "The Shaking is for Shifting" from Joel!   '

b'God is saying, That dream is not only still alive, but Im still going to bring it to pass. Hes still going to show you favor, Hes still going to heal you, Hes still going to open doors you couldnt open, Hes still going to take you where you cant go on your own.'

b'Youve been saying it, youve been faithful, believing, expecting. Get ready; youre about to see it. God is about to do something so big, so unusual, so out of the ordinary there wont be any doubt to you and to those around you that His favor is on your life.'

b'Theres a place of victory, a place of abundance that God has already prepared for you. There are people that God has already spoken to, to be good to you.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "The Shaking is for Shifting". Check it out here:  '

b'When you know who you are, when you know youve been equipped and empowered, when you know God being for you is more than the world being against you, you wont run from your enemies, youll run toward your enemies.'

b'In these times of shaking, God will always give us the grace that we need. The scripture says, God has armed us with strength for every battle. If well tap into that strength we wont go around overwhelmed and stressed out.'

b'The shaking is a sign that a shift is taking place. God is about to launch you to a new level, youre about to see something that youve never seen.\n\nClick here to watch, "The Shaking is for Shifting":  '

b'God is doing a new thing. Dont think that the whole world being put on pause is just a physical thing, there are spiritual things happening. God is up to something big. Hes looking for people whose hearts are turned toward Him.'

b'If we put our trust in our job, our career, it can suddenly change. Thats why its so important to put your trust in God. Hes the One that doesnt change. Hes our source. Thats where we get strength, ideas, creativity, resources, wisdom. God is the giver of all good things.'

b'God has you in the palm of His hand. Nothing can happen to you without His permission. He wont allow a difficulty to keep you from your destiny.\n\nListen now to this message from Joel, "The Shaking is for Shifting":  '

b'God never said there wouldnt be times where things were shaken, unfair, we dont understand. Thats not the time to fall apart.  Thats the time to speak victory over your life. That difficulty didnt come to stay, it came to pass.'

b'We may not like it, but the shaking is forcing us to change, its forcing us to grow.  Stay open for something new. Dont go back to the same ways you used to do things. The reason God allowed the shaking is to shift you into something better.'

b'In life, we all have these times where things shake us to our core. But heres the key, the shaking is not there to stop you; the shaking is there to shift you.\n\nTune into Joels message today! "The Shaking is for Shifting"  '

b'Anyone can trust God when things are going their way, life is good, youre seeing favor. The real test is will you trust Him when things are shaking? Will you stay in faith when theres uncertainty, things you dont understand?'

b'When God speaks, His words are so powerful that things happen where there is no explanation. God is supernatural. He said you will live and not die. He has the final say. Medically speaking, it cant be explained. The only explanation is we serve a God who is all-powerful.'

b'Dont have a small vision. Dont go around thinking youve reached your limits. God is about to do a new thing, something that you havent seen. Hes going to open doors you never dreamed would open, take you places that you cant go on your own.'

b'We dont know what people are going through. Your words can be what keeps them moving forward. God puts people in our path on purpose so we can bring healing. Letting people know that you care does more than you imagine.'

b'What the enemy sent to stop you is not going to have its intended purpose. Keep thanking God that Hes fighting your battles, that what was meant for harm, Hes turning to your advantage.\n\nCheck out "You Have the Cure" on Podcast here!  '

b'When youre in difficult times, dont sit around. Do something where God can see your faith. Make plans to get well, make plans to come out of that trouble, make plans for God to show out in your life.'

b'The scripture says, Every good gift comes from our Father in heaven above. That good gift may come through people, but it came from God. Your salary may come through your company, but it came from your Heavenly Father.'

b'Dont go through life looking down, thinking, This problem is too big; its never going to work out. Get a new perspective. The forces that are for you are greater than the forces that are against you.\n\nDon\'t miss, "You Have the Cure" from Joel!   '
b'Faith is not always going to make sense; what God says is not always going to be logical. If you reason it out and check with all the experts and study all the reports, youll miss Gods best.'
b'You may be surrounded by trouble, surrounded by debt, surrounded by addiction, but what you cant see is the Most High God is surrounding whats surrounding you.'
b'You cant see it, but God is working behind the scenes. Hes making things happen that you couldnt make happen.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "You Have the Cure". Check it out here:  '
b'Its not enough to just believe you have favor, believe that youre blessed, believe that youre going to fulfill your dreams. The scripture says the spirit of faith is in our words.'

b'Why do you think the enemys trying to stop you? He doesnt bother people that are not a threat. He wouldnt waste his time on you if he didnt know you were a world changer, a history maker, that you have seeds of greatness.'

b'Dont be surprised if you get a few snake bites: a friend walks away, the company doesnt need you anymore. Take the anti-venom. God, I know Youre still on the throne. I know no weapon formed against me will prosper.\n\nCheck out, "You Have the Cure":  '

b'When you go through loss and things knock the wind out of you, its tempting to give up on life, think that youve seen your best days. You have to say, Father, thank You that You have beauty for these ashes. Thank You that there are good days up ahead.'
b'Were not at the mercy of fear, depression, addictions. We have the cure. The Most High God is breathing in our direction. Him being for you is more than the world being against you.'

b'The enemy will try to poison you with doubt, poison you with fear, poison you with insecurity. That poison cannot keep you from your destiny.\n\nListen now to this message from Joel, "You Have the Cure":  '

b'You cant reach your destiny if youre always looking back. Nothing youve done is a surprise to God. He knew every mistake you would make, every failure. You can still get to where youre supposed to be, but you have to shake off the guilt and move ahead.'
b'God is saying, Look up.  Theres healing when you look up. Theres freedom when you look up. Theres victory when you look up. Theres salvation when you look up.'
b'Proverbs says, "Gods word is like medicine." When you meditate on it, it brings healing and wholeness.\n\nTune into Joels message this morning! "You Have the Cure"  '

b'When youre dealing with fear, depression, anxiety, dont just accept it and think, Ill always struggle in this area. Take your medicine. Father, thank You that I am free, I have the mind of Christ, I have peace that surpasses understanding.'
b'Sometimes God will let you get into a situation where there is no possible way out so that when He turns it around, everyone will know it was Him.'

b'Whatever God put in your heart, go after it. Quit looking at how impossible it is, how long its been, what you dont have. Shake off the disappointments, what didnt work out, who left you. You have greatness in you.'
b'God said He will never let you face anything that you cant handle. He will always give you the grace, the strength, the faith, for what comes your way.'

b'Who told you that youre not qualified? Who told you that youve made too many mistakes, youll never be successful? Those are the wrong voices. Tune that out and get in tune with God.\n\nCheck out "Power Thinking" on Podcast here!  '

b'God doesnt have to prove anything. Hes God, whether we believe it or not. But sometimes, Hell prove to people that youre His child when youre in difficult situations where youre outnumbered, when the giants are too big, when the addiction seems permanent.'

b'The critics, the naysayers, are a dime a dozen. Eighty percent will tell you what you cant do. You have to find the twenty percent that will tell you what you can do. The majority wont encourage you; they wont see what you see. You have to find the minority.'

b'At the start of the day, you need to set your mind for victory. Dont let just any thoughts play. You have to think on purpose. Get your mind going in the right direction.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Power Thinking" from Joel!   '
b'You may not like it, it may be uncomfortable, but stay in faith. They meant it to harm you, but God is going to use it to promote you. When He pays you back, youre not going to come out the same.'

b'Dont go through life thinking you cant reach your dreams, you cant overcome that obstacle, youll never meet the right person. You have the key. Your Heavenly Father has given you everything you need to fulfill your purpose.'

b'You dont have to fear the virus, fear what the economy is going to do, fear the future.  Keep honoring God and He will keep you safe.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "Power Thinking". Check it out here:  '
b'God likes to do things far and beyond what we could ever accomplish on our own. If you can reach your dreams in your own talent, your own strength, your own effort, then you dont need God.'

b'Where are the people that believe God will display His awesome power through them? Its good to read about His power, its good to talk about it, good to remember it, but God wants you to experience it.'
b'Look at how big your God is. He parted Red Seas; He closed the mouths of lions; He brought the dead back to life. That obstacle is no match for Him.\n\nClick here to watch, "Power Thinking":  '

b'It may be tough now, but keep the right perspective. Victory is in your future; healing is in your future. Abundance, freedom, breakthroughs are in your future. The giants may be big, but our God is bigger.'
b'The enemy knows if he can keep you defeated in your thoughts, then hell keep you defeated in your life. The battle is taking place in our minds.'

b'Proverbs 4 says, Be careful what you think because your thoughts run your life. Are your thoughts helping you or hurting you?  Start thinking power thoughts, victory thoughts.\n\nListen now to this message from Joel, "Power Thinking":  '

b'Pay attention to what youre dwelling on. Dont just think of anything that comes to mind. If its negative, discouraging, fearful, dont give it the time of day. Turn it around and dwell on what God says about you.'

b'The way to get in tune with God is to think what He says about you, not what you feel, not what it looks like, not what the experts say, not what the economy says, but what the Most High God has spoken over you.'
b'Victory starts in our minds. Success, breakthroughs, new levels depend on our thinking.\n\nTune into Joels message here! "Power Thinking"  '

b"We draw in what we constantly think about. You cant think defeat and have victory. You cant think weak and have strength. You cant think you're not able and accomplish your dreams. Your life is going to follow your thoughts."

b'We dont realize the power of our words, the power of a simple compliment, the power of, I believe in you. Youre going to make it. Your words may seem ordinary to you, but when God breathes life into them, they become extraordinary to the other person.'

b'Will you stay in faith when God is silent? Will you wait with a good attitude, thanking God that He has the final say when nothing is changing?  How you wait will determine whether or not your situation changes.'

b'Maybe youre standing on a promise and it hasnt come to pass yet. Dont worry; your time is coming. Stay in faith. Keep reminding Him what He promised. Keep bringing it to remembrance, thanking Him that its on the way. Youre going to see God show out in your life.'
b'The final word says your latter days will be better than your former days. The final word says what God started in your life He will finish.\n\nCheck out "God Has the Final Say" on Podcast here!  '
b'Its not over until God says its over. Go back and look again. Your story doesnt end in defeat; it ends in victory. Get your passion back and start believing again.'

b'Put God in remembrance of what He promised, not what you feel like, not what a relative said, but what God said. Psalm 86 says, God is full of kindness, and great in mercy. The Lord is good to all.'

b'God is about to break those yokes that have pulled you down so you can step up to who you were created to be. The final word is freedom, wholeness, abundance, victory.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "God Has the Final Say" from Joel!   '
b'God wants to help you. He wants to heal you, to free you, to increase you, to take you places that youve never dreamed. Hes longing to be good to you. Look to Him as your Source.'

b'When we come to the end of what we can do thats where God steps in. If you can accomplish your dreams on your own, you dont need God. If you can get out of the problem by yourself, it doesnt take much faith.'
b'When we face difficulties, one of the best things we can do is find a promise in the scripture and remind God what He said.'
b'Dont dwell on what seems impossible. Are you spending more time thinking about the problem or the promise? Are you talking more about how big the challenge is or about how big your God is?'

b'God is on the throne. Him being for you is more than the world being against you. God wont allow you to get into a problem that He cant get you out of.\n\nClick here to watch, "God Has the Final Say":  '

b'Too often were striving to make things happen, discouraged because its taking too long, trying to beat down doors. God is saying, Come to Me. Ask Me for help. Call on My name and acknowledge Me as your Source.'
b'We may not understand it, but you can rest assured that God has the final say. He planned your days before you were born, and He promised that He will fulfill the number of your days.'
b'God hasnt forgotten about you. What He promised is still on the way. What God started Hes going to finish. He has the final say.\n\nListen now to this message from Joel, "God Has the Final Say":  '

b'Take the problem off the throne and put God back on the throne. God is sovereign over your circumstances. That means God reigns over everything in your life. Not just the universe, but He reigns over the sickness, over your children, over your finances.'

b'You think its been too long; it didnt happen in time. So you put the stone over the promise, put the stone over the dream. But you have to do your part and roll that stone away. Start believing again. Get your passion back.'

b'You have an advantage. The Creator of the universe not only breathed life into you, but He put a hedge of protection around you. Nothing can touch you without His permission.\n\nTune into Joels message this morning! "God Has the Final Say"  '

b'They crucified Jesus and put Him in the grave. They thought He was done, but on the third day, He rose up and said, I am alive forevermore. God has the final say. Hes already planned out your days for good. '
b'We can live with the confidence that all of our sinspast, present, and futurehave not just been covered, not just been atoned for, but they have been washed away. We have an everlasting release.'

b'Jesus is the rock from which the water of life flows out: salvation, healing, freedom, abundance.  We dont have to work for our salvation, try to be good enough, earn Gods love, earn forgiveness. This new covenant is not based on works; its based on grace.'
b'You can stay in peace, knowing that the God who created the universe is the guardian of your soul.\n\nCheck out "The Guardian of Your Soul" on Podcast here!  '

b'The scripture says, God has already accepted you, Hes already blotted out your sins, Hes already shed His blood. Its not if Hes going to do it; Hes already done it. The question is will you receive it?'
b'You dont know what God is up to. Youre looking at it in the natural, but we serve a supernatural God. Get in agreement with Him. Believe that something good is on the way.'

b'Start declaring, Lord, thank You that Youre my protector. Thank You that Youre shielding me from every plague, rescuing me from every trap."\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "The Guardian of Your Soul" from Joel!   '
b'Whatever youve given up on, whatever youve talked yourself out of, whatever youre convinced is not going to happen, those buried dreams need to be dug up. Theyre still alive.'

b'There will always be forces trying to convince us to settle where we are, but you have to stir your faith up. God didnt bring you this far to leave you. What He started in your life, Hes going to finish. You may not see how it can happen, but He has a way.'

b'Your body is a temple of the Most High God. Sickness doesnt belong in your temple, depression doesnt belong in your temple, fear doesnt belong there.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "The Guardian of Your Soul". Check it out here:  '
b'Its good to read about His power, its good to talk about it, good to remember it, but God wants you to experience it. He wants to show out in a new way.'
b'Get around dreamers; connect with people that are more talented, more successful, more experienced. Learn from them. Thats good soil.'
b'Just because you dont see anything happening, doesnt mean God is not working. '
b'There is a God watching over you that will rescue you from trouble. He will stop the plan of the enemy.\n\nClick here to watch, "The Guardian of Your Soul":  '
b'We may not understand it, we dont like it, but God knows what Hes doing. Its not going to keep you from your purpose. Its leading you to your purpose.'

b'You cant watch the news all day and stay afloat. If you constantly take in the negative, youre going to sink. Tune it out and tune into what God says about you. Dont let whats on the outside get on the inside.'
b'Psalm 91:3 says, God will rescue you from every trap and protect you from the fatal plague.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "The Guardian of Your Soul":  '

b'God didnt say we wouldnt have trouble, we wouldnt have to face these things, but He did promise He would rescue you from trouble. You dont have to live worried about your future. God has a hedge of protection around you.'

b'Choose to live from a place of faith and not a place of fear. When youre in peace, thats a position of power. When you know God is in control, youre going to be strong, youre going to feel a force sustaining you.'
b'Youre not in this by yourself. You have a protector, a defender, a deliverer. The Most High God is the guardian of your soul.\n\nWatch Joels new message this morning! "The Guardian of Your Soul"  '
b'God has a shield around you. He knows how to keep harm away. He knows how to heal you. He knows how to restore what was taken. He will rescue you from every trap.'
b'When you say, God, You promised, something powerful happens. Chains are broken, forces of darkness are pushed back, impossible situations turn around. Nothing can stand against our God.'
b'Come back to a place of peace. Yes, theres uncertainty. We dont know what the future holds, but we do know Who holds the future. God is still on the throne.'

b'This is not the time to live worried, afraid. The God who breathed life into you is watching over you. Hes pushing back the opposition. Hes ordering your steps, putting you at the right place at the right time.'

b'Let this phrase sink down in your spirit, "It shall be well with you."  God is your provider. He clothes the lilies of the field. He feeds the birds of the air.\n\nCheck out "In the Middle of a Miracle" on Podcast here!  '

b'You may have a giant in your path: a giant of debt, of sickness, of depression. You need to announce to that giant, I will defeat you. You are not going to keep me from my destiny. The forces that are for me are greater than the forces that are trying to stop me.'
b"Life is not about being angry, getting revenge, and being mean to people that have been mean to you. Thats a shallow way to live. Instead, lift someone up that's pushed you down."

b'Youre not close to your miracle only when everything is calm and peaceful. Sometimes its the opposite. It\'s when its chaotic, when youre tempted to live afraid, worried.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "In the Middle of a Miracle" from Joel!   '
b'God has never failed in the past, and Hes not going to start with you. Stay in faith and stay open. It may not happen your way or on your time table, but God is true to His word.'

b'You are drawing in what youre thinking about. Dont use your energy to worry; use your energy to believe.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "In the Middle of a Miracle". Check it out here:  '

b'Behind the paycheck, behind the salary, behind the opportunity is the Most High God causing people to be good to you, causing that door to open, causing that client to seek you out. Be thankful for the resource, but keep your eyes on the Source.'

b'Isaiah said, God makes rivers in the desert. He makes streams in the barren places. This is showing us that God is going to do unusual things.\n\nClick here to watch, "In the Middle of a Miracle":  '
b'The opposition, the trouble, the lack is not the end. Why? Youre in the middle of a miracle. Victory is coming, healing is coming, freedom is coming, new levels are coming.'

b'God can do what medicine cannot do. Medical science may run out of options, but God never runs out of options. He breathed His life into you. He has the final say; nothing can snatch you out of His hands.'

b'You cant be defeated. The enemy cant stop Gods plan for your life. Healing is coming, freedom is coming, breakthroughs are coming.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "In the Middle of a Miracle":  '

b'The scripture says, Is there anything too hard for God? He spoke worlds into existence. He flung stars into space. He has you in the palm of his hand. What Hes destined for your life will come to pass.'

b'Were in the middle of a miracle. God is in the process of bringing us out. Without His favor we would be overcome; without His protection we would be defeated.\n\nJoels new message this morning! "In the Middle of a Miracle"  '

b'God says, Be still and know that I am God. You could think of a hundred things that could go wrong, but God didnt bring you this far to leave you. Hes keeping the trouble from defeating you. Stay in peace; youre in the middle of a miracle.'
b'You have to stir up your faith, stir up your praise. Start speaking victory over your life. Start thanking God that Hes fighting your battles. This, too, shall pass. Greater is coming.'

b'Happy birthday to my beautiful wife Victoria. It seems like it was just yesterday when I walked into the jewelry store and you took my breath away. Little did I know then, youre outer beauty is only surpassed by your inner beauty. I am so grateful to spend my life with you. '

b'Youre never wasting time serving others. Its a part of Gods plan. You cant reach your destiny without that time of being faithful to another persons dream. Thats showing God that He can trust you with your own.'
b'God has already called you to live a victorious life. Hes already called you to overcome every obstacle.\n\nCheck out "Greater is Coming" on Podcast here!  '
b'Your time is coming. God has not forgotten what He promised you. Your mistakes didnt cancel your destiny; people not being for you hasnt stopped His plan.'

b'Keep believing when every thought is telling you its never going to change. Keep declaring Gods promises when it seems like its not doing any good. \n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Greater is Coming" from Joel!   '

b'Lord, I lift up our friends that are watching right now. I ask that they would feel that Peace that surpasses all understanding. All the worry, all the fear, the anxiety is leaving. Thank You that faith is rising in their hearts, in the name of Jesus. Amen '
b'God has waited on all of us. Now Hes asking, Will you wait on someone for Me? Will you call them, encourage them, let them know that you care?'

b'Dont believe that what youre going through is never going to change. That suffering is not going to last. It didnt come to stay; it came to pass.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "Greater is Coming". Check it out here:  '
b'Something powerful happens when you get your mind off yourself and you go out and be good to somebody else.'
b'Your best days are still ahead. Stay in faith. Keep believing. '
b'In the middle of the battle, say, Lord, thank You that greater joy is coming. Thank You that Youre pushing back forces of darkness.\n\nClick here to watch, "Greater is Coming":  '

b'When youre in tough times, you can either talk about how big the problem is or talk about how big your God is. You can either complain about the trouble or you can thank God that the trouble is only temporary.'

b'The trouble is temporary, but the glory is permanent. The key is dont stay focused on the suffering; stay focused on the glory thats coming.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "Greater is Coming":  '
b'RobinRoberts GMA Great to be with you this morning.  God bless you and the team.'
b'Keep the right perspective: the suffering is not permanent. That suffering is not going to last. It didnt come to stay; it came to pass.'
b'Start believing again; start dreaming again. Start talking like its going to happen; start acting like its going to happen. Start thanking God that its on the way.'

b'When youre in tough times, you need to remind yourself that is not how your story ends. Greater is coming: greater joy, greater strength, greater relationships.\n\nWatch Joels new message this morning! "Greater is Coming"  '

b'We all have unfair things happen. Some things were not going to understand. Dont spend your life trying to answer all the whys of life; thats going to frustrate you. God knows how to work all things for your good.'
b'If you cant celebrate people that are further along than you, then youll never get to where they are. Be happy for them.'
b'We think natural, but God is supernatural. Hes not limited by what limits us. He controls the universe. Dont let your natural logic talk you out of what a supernatural God can do.'

b'Your race has been designed specifically for you. Youre not in competition with your friends, your neighbors, your siblings, your coworkers. The only competition you have is with yourself, to be the best that you can be.'
b'God is your protector, your deliverer, your way maker, your provider, your healer.\n\nCheck out "Invite God Into Your Difficulties" on podcast here!  '
b'Are you recognizing the Source? Are you thanking God for every good thing? The more you acknowledge Gods goodness, the more of His goodness you will see.'

b'When you honor God, you are connected to a supply line that will never run dry. Youre not at the mercy of the economy or who likes you or what your boss does. God has all kinds of resources He can use.'
b'Without a great test, you wont have a great testimony. Without big battles, you wont have big victories.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Invite God Into Your Difficulties" from Joel!   '

b'Take a break from telling God everything thats wrong. He already knows your needs. Theres nothing wrong with asking, but at some point, you need to switch over to thanking Him for what Hes promised.'
b'Dont just pray the problems; pray the promises. If you only tell God whats wrong, then youre limiting what He can do. Follow up the problem with a promise.'
b'When Hes with you, you cant be defeated. You and God are a majority. Hes a supernatural God.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "Invite God Into Your Difficulties". Check it out here:  '

b'The right attitude is, God, I believe Youre going to bring me out, but in the meantime, Im asking You to come into this struggle in my health, come into this loss that Im going through, come into this depression thats trying to stop me.'
b'God doesnt stop every negative situation; He uses these adversities to move us closer to Him.\n\nClick here to watch, "Invite God Into Your Difficulties":  '
b'You dont have to do this in your own strength. You dont have to figure it all out. Youre not going to know all the details. You have to walk by faith and not by sight.'

b'We wouldnt know His power if we were never thrown into a fire. We wouldnt know He was a healer if we never faced an illness. We wouldnt know He could move mountains if we never faced a big obstacle.'
b'God is working in the trouble. Hes working in that situation thats difficult.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "Invite God Into Your Difficulties":  '
b'The Psalmist says, God is a very present help in times of trouble. We know God is always with us, but when youre in difficulties, if youll invite Him in, youll feel His presence in a greater way.'

b'Whats more powerful than God bringing you out of that difficulty is when God comes in and begins to change things. He comes in and gives you favor despite whos trying to push you down, strength that you cant explain, grace to outlast what should stop you.'
b'The God who controls the fire, the God who speaks to storms, the God who restores, who heals, who pays you back for the injustice, is watching over you, protecting you, ordering your steps.'

b'Dont worry if youre not getting credit. Dont get discouraged if people dont thank you. God sees your sacrifice. When you give, He gives you more back. When you show someone favor, He shows you more favor.'
b'Victoria and I want you to know we are praying for you and Gods got you in the palm of His hand. I have learned a place of peace is a place of power. '
b'The scripture says, No man can take your joy. That means you control your joy. Nothing can take it from you; you have to give it away.\n\nCheck out "Keep Your Joy" on Podcast here!  '

b'When the odds are against you and you dont see how it could work out, dont get discouraged. Remind yourself tomorrow will be better than today. Thats not just being positive, thats what the scripture says, The path of the righteous gets brighter and brighter.'

b'Amazing things are up ahead if you dont give up. There will be new beginnings, times where God pays you back. Dont get stuck. God wouldnt have allowed it if it wasnt going to move you toward your destiny. Pass the test.'

b'You are as happy as you want to be. You have to declare, I am not going to live sour, defeated, depressed. Ive made up my mind. Im going to enjoy this day.  \n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Keep Your Joy" from Joel!   '
b'When you let people upset you, youre giving away your power.  Listen now to this message from Joel, "Keep Your Joy".\n\nCheck it out here:  '

b'Have you let circumstances tell you who you are, negative thoughts convince you that youve seen your best days? You have to call yourself blessed, prosperous, healthy, forgiven, confident, valuable, child of the Most High God.'
b'When youre tempted to get upset, remind yourself, you have the power to remain calm. Keep it in perspective; this day is a gift. Honor God by living it grateful, happy, and to the fullest.'

b'God will be your vindicator. He knows how to take care of the opposition  If youll stay in peace, Hell fight your battles. When God does it, it will be better than you could have done it.  Click here to watch, "Keep Your Joy":  '
b'People have a right to have their opinions, but you have a right to ignore them. People have a right to be rude, but you have a right to stay happy.'

b'Life is so much more freeing when youre not controlled by what people say, youre not offended when someone is rude, youre not sour when traffic is bad, youre not upset because the flight is delayed.'

b'You have to accept that some people, no matter what you do, are not going to like you. Be at peace with people not being at peace with you.\n\nListen now to this message from Joel, "Keep Your Joy":  '
b'Its easy to live uptight, frustrated, worried, but most of the things that are upsetting us, in the big picture, dont really matter.'
b'You cant control what people do, what they say, but you can control how you respond. Dont give away your joy.'
b'Your job is to run your race, to be who God has called you to be and not worry about the critics and the naysayers.\n\nWatch Joels message this morning! "Keep Your Joy"  '

b'Dont let the small things keep you from seeing the gift of this day. Keep it in perspective. Its not worth losing your joy over. You have health, you have life, you have freedom, you have opportunity.'
b'Too often, were discouraged over what God has ordained. But there are times God will take you backward before He thrusts you forward. The cutback is a test.'
b'There will never be another you. Let your gifts shine. Show your personality, your talent, your style. We dont need an imitation. We dont need a copy. We need the original you.'
b'Some things you have to endure. The way to do that is to know that its not permanent; youre going to come out better.'

b'When you come to the end of life, youre not going to give an account to people of what you did with your time, your talents, your resources. Youre going to give an account to God.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "No More Distractions" from Joel!   '
b'Your destiny is connected to helping the people God has put in your life. Who can you bless, who can you help heal?'

b'You dont have to worry about your future; your life is divinely orchestrated. God has determined the end from the beginning. Hes already laid out the plan, drawn up the blueprint. He knows everything thats going to happen.'
b'Dont go through life trying to please everyone. If you try to keep every person happy, the one person that wont be happy is you.\n\nCheck out "No More Distractions" on Podcast here!  '
b'Quit wishing you were something different. God doesnt make mistakes. Youre not faulty. You have been fearfully and wonderfully made.'

b'Your words can heal. When youre kind, encouraging, when youre free with your compliments, youre being a healer. God wouldnt have put that compliment in you, He wouldnt have given you that desire, if the other person didnt need it.'

b'You have a destiny to fulfill. Your assignment is waiting for you. You cant worry about people who dont want to have peace with you.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "No More Distractions". Check it out here:  '

b'Everyone has a right to have their opinion, and you have the right not to agree with it. No matter what you do, some people are not going to understand. Start running your race. Follow what God put in your heart.'

b'Quit wasting time trying to convince someone to understand you when they\'re determined to misunderstand you.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "No More Distractions":  '

b'Some people will find fault, try to discredit you, think youre missing it. Thats okay. No one thats ever done anything great has done it without opposition, without critics, without people thinking they were off course.'

b'You cant be a people pleaser and reach your potential. People will try to squeeze you into what theyre used to, into what they think. Take advice, listen to counsel, but you may have to disappoint a few people to reach your destiny.'
b'If youre going to reach your highest potential, you cant get distracted by things that are keeping you from your purpose.\n\nWatch Joels new message this morning! "No More Distractions"  '

b'When you honor God with your life, there is a blessing He puts on you that gives you an advantage. You wont have room to receive all the good things God has in store.'

b'Get ready, that addiction is about to suddenly go, that opposition is about to suddenly be defeated, that sickness is about to suddenly change.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "It\'s Just a Matter of Time" from Joel!   '
b'God is still on the throne. Hes bigger than your opposition, greater than your sickness, more powerful than your enemies.'
b'Just because God is silent, doesnt mean Hes given up. You may not see anything happening, but God is still working. What He promised you is still on the way.'

b'You have to believe that when you prayed, the miracle was set into motion. You cant wait for the evidence & then youll start believing. You have to believe first.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "It\'s Just a Matter of Time". Check it out here:  '
b'Anything you gain without integrity wont be what it should have been. Its better to be truthful and have less. Then, Gods favor will take you further.'
b'If you had what somebody else had it wouldnt help you, it would hinder you. It wouldnt be a blessing it would be a burden. Quit wishing you were them, recognize you are enough.'
b'Some of the things youre concerned about, God has already done. You havent seen it, but in the unseen realm, things have changed. \n\nClick here to watch, "It\'s Just a Matter of Time":  '

b'If you just had some evidence, if you just had a little sign, then you would believe. But, this is what faith is all about. You cant be moved by what you dont see; you have to be moved by what you know.'
b'When nothing has changed and you dont have any evidence, the key is you have to believe that it happens when you pray. You have to receive it in your spirit before youll see it in the natural.'

b'Are you waiting for the evidence to believe what God said about you? Are you talking yourself out of it because you dont see any sign?\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "It\'s Just a Matter of Time":  '

b'Hebrews says, Hold fast the confession of your faith. You have to hold fast to what God put in your heart. There are forces trying to convince us that what God said is never going to happen. Dont believe those lies. In the unseen realm, things have already changed.'

b'We prayed, we believed, but we dont see anything improving. What you cant see is the moment you prayed, in the unseen realm, the source of what was coming against you was cut off: the source of that fear, the source of the addiction, the source of the sickness.'

b'The scripture says, The strength of the wicked is being cut off, and the power of the godly is being increased. Everything thats trying to stop you, that power is being cut off.\n\nWatch Joels new message this morning! "It\'s Just a Matter of Time"  '

b'God is faithful. Dont let the lack of evidence convince you that nothing is happening. In the unseen realm, things are changing in your favor. Forces that have stopped you in the past have been broken.'
b'The bigger you make God, the smaller your problems will become, the more faith will rise in your heart.'
b'The enemy wouldnt be trying to stop you if He didnt know something greater was in front of you. Stay encouraged; the surge is coming.'
b'God already knows our weaknesses, our fears, our doubts. You dont have to have it all together. Youre a work in progress. Gods not finished with you.'

b'God doesnt create anyone without putting something significant on the inside. Thats why the enemy works overtime trying to convince you that youre not enough.\n\nCheck out "You Are Enough" on Podcast here! '

b'You cant live on autopilot and just think whatever comes your way. If you do, negative thoughts will dominate. You have to be proactive. If youll fill your mind with the right thoughts there wont be any room for the wrong thoughts.'
b'There should be people youre in your life that inspire you, that challenge you, that make you strive to do better. Eventually youre going to be like the people youre connected to.'
b'Quit looking at what you dont have, what you cant do, what you didnt get. You have everything you need.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "You Are Enough" from Joel!   '

b'Things may not change overnight, but if youll stay in faith, there will come a time when God will say, Enough is enough." Hes going to turn things around and not just bring you out; Hes going to give you what you are owed.'
b'Its not your battle; the battle is the Lords. Hell not only take care of your opposition, Hell make it up to you. Hes keeping the records. He knows what youre owed.'

b'When God puts you with eagles, dont have a chicken mentality. Dont start talking about how that could never happen for you. Let it take root on the inside. Breathe it all in. Get used to it. Thats where God is taking you. Hes exposing you to new levels.'

b'When you realize you are enough by yourself, then you wont rely on people to approve you. Youll get your approval from your Heavenly Father. You know youre made in His image. You know Hes crowned you with favor.'

b'Is there something youre looking for that you already have? Youre looking around you but God is saying, Look in you."  You have the talent, you have the confidence, you have the creativity. You need to see yourself as a no lack person.'
b'Dont be discouraged when what youre up against is too big, you dont have the resources, the opposition is stronger. Youre in perfect position for God to show out in your life.'
b'You dont need peoples approval. You dont need their validation. The Most High God has approved you.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "You Are Enough":  '

b'Do you know what your Father has given you? Do you know you have the key to unlock every door to your destiny? You didnt get shortchanged. God has great confidence in you. He believes in you more than you believe in yourself.'

b'God doesnt make any mistakes. When He created you He wasnt having a bad day. He didnt accidentally leave something out. God calls you a masterpiece.  Hes crowned you with His favor. Youre not lacking. You have everything you need to fulfill your destiny.'

b'God gave you the talent you need, the creativity, the strength. You didnt get shortchanged. You are good enough, you are talented enough, you are smart enough, you are attractive enough. You have been fearfully and wonderfully made.'
b'Its not luck; its favor. Its God shining down on you, making things happen that you couldnt make happen.'

b'One of your dreams may have died, but that didnt stop Gods plan. He has another dream. One relationship may not have worked out, but if youll kiss the old goodbye, youll see the new God has lined up.'

b'When Moses asked God His name. He said, My name is I Am. He was saying, I am everything. I am protection. I am strength. I am healing. I am provision. I am wisdom. Nothing can stand against our God.'

b'If youll take the hand youve been dealt and make the most of it, God will open doors you couldnt open. The favor on your life will take you where you couldnt go on your own.\n\nCheck out "Kiss It Goodbye" on Podcast here!  '

b'You dont have to see how; all you have to do is believe. When you believe, angels go to work. When you believe, forces of darkness are pushed back. When you believe, things begin to change in your favor.'

b'There will always be forces trying to convince us to settle where we are, but you have to stir your faith up. God didnt bring you this far to leave you. What He started in your life, Hes going to finish. You may not see how it can happen, but He has a way.'

b'God already knew what was going to happen. He knew who was going to walk away. All that is getting you prepared for where God is taking you.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Kiss It Goodbye" from Joel!   '

b'You cant hold onto the old and expect to receive the new. The past is over and done. Thats why its called the past. Quit dwelling on it; quit reliving it. God has a purpose. He knows how to bring good out of it. Keep moving forward.'
b'You cant think the same way and expect different results. Start embracing who God says you are. You are fearfully and wonderfully made. You are a masterpiece.'

b'2020 Blessing\n\nYou are blessed, prosperous, redeemed, forgiven, talented, creative, disciplined, focused, confident, secure, equipped, empowered, anointed, accepted, approved, not average, not mediocre, you are a child of the most high God! '
b'Tell the excuses, It is finished. Tell the discouragement, It is finished. This is a new season. God is about to do a new thing. Happy New Year to you and your family! '
b'Youve spent enough energy on the past; thats not taking you anywhere. Kiss the disappointment goodbye. You cant embrace the new things God has in store as long as youre holding onto the old.'

b'You wont have the strength to keep moving forward if youre weeping over whats behind. It takes a lot of energy to think about the past, to relive hurts.\n\nClick here to watch, "Kiss It Goodbye":  '
b'Its time to kiss some things goodbye. Kiss failure goodbye; this is a new day. Kiss guilt goodbye; youre forgiven. Kiss what didnt work out goodbye. God has something better.'

b'Our attitude should be, God, I trust You not just with my successes, but I trust You with my failures, with the betrayals, with the things that dont make sense. When you kiss the past goodbye, it releases you into your future.'
b'Dont bring bitterness into the new year. You cant embrace the new things God has in store as long as youre holding onto the old.\n\nListen now to this message from Joel, "Kiss It Goodbye":  '
b'People may walk away, life may not turn out the way you had thought, but God has something better in front of you.'

b'What youre not willing to walk away from is where youll get stuck. If you dont let go of the wrong people, youll never meet the right people. If someone is not adding value to your life, making you better, pushing you into your destiny, you need to make a change.'
b'If youre going to reach your destiny, you have to learn to kiss some things goodbye.\n\nWatch Joels message this morning! "Kiss It Goodbye"  '

b'You wont have the strength to keep moving forward if youre weeping over whats behind. It takes a lot of energy to relive hurts and wonder why it didnt work out. If it didnt work out the way you had planned, it wasnt supposed to.'

b'The enemy meant it for your harm. Hed love to convince you to live discouraged, not pursuing dreams, thinking its never going to work out. Dont believe those lies. Its setting you up for new levels of your destiny.'
b'The scripture says, When you seek God first all these things will be added unto you. God wants to not only meet your needs, He wants to give you the desires of your heart.'
b'God knows how to pay you back. He knows whats not fair. He sees every sparrow. How much more does God see everything that happens to you?'
b'God gave you a destiny to fulfill. He has moments of favor where He will make things happen that you couldnt make happen. \n\nCheck out "It\'s Already Set Up" on Podcast here!  '

b'Your words can limit your life or they can increase your life. They can curse your future or they can bless your future. What youre saying in the storm will determine whether you come out of that storm. Talk about how big your God is.'
b'Are there favor connections God has put in your life that youre overlooking: people that have what you want, that are further along? Dont be intimidated by their success; be inspired.'

b'People judge by the outside. Theyll try to write you off, but they dont know what God put in you. They cant see your seeds of greatness.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "It\'s Already Set Up" from Joel!\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 '

b'You werent created to go through life lonely. That person that walked away, that didnt value you, that told you how you werent good enough, attractive enough, smart enough, dont believe those lies. You are made in the image of God. He calls you a masterpiece.'
b'When you live in faith, expecting Gods goodness, there are moments of favor that youll come into suddenly. \n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "It\'s Already Set Up". Check it out here:  '
b'Today is a gift. Once we live this day, we cant get it back. Dont let a disappointment keep you from enjoying this day. Start dreaming again, start loving again, start laughing again.'
b'The scripture says, God has purposed it, who can annul? Thats saying what God has already set up, who can stop it.\n\nClick here to watch, "It\'s Already Set Up":  '

b'What God has ordained for you will not go to anyone else. Dont worry about someone getting your promotion, your blessing, your favor, your spouse. What God has prophesied for your life cannot be taken by someone else.'
b'Gods already lined up the right people, hes already set up the breaks you need. Not only are your steps being divinely orchestrated, but God is orchestrating the circumstances around you.'

b'You dont have to try convince someone to be good to you, the people God has ordained to help you, Hes already prepared their hearts.\n\nListen now to this message from Joel, "It\'s Already Set Up":  '
b'You dont have to figure it out. All you have to do is believe. If youll stay in faith youll come into these destiny moments where youll see what God has already set up.'

b'God knows what youre going to need, when youre going to need it, and how to get it to you. The problem youre worried about, God has the answer already in route. The vindication, the healing, the breakthrough, its already set up.'

b'That problem you think will never turn around, Hes already set up the answer. Its not a surprise to God. He had the solution before you had the problem. \n\nWatch Joels message this morning! "It\'s Already Set Up"  '
b'The scripture says, No person has seen heard or imagined what God has prepared for those that love Him. God has some things prepared that are going to amaze you.'

b'What you see may seem small compared to what God promised you, its easy to dismiss it and think its nothing. But God can take a small cloud and bring a big blessing. He can take what looks insignificant and cause it to turn into something amazing.'

b'Keep doing the right thing. Dont take matters into your own hands. God is your defender. By this time next year, the enemies you see today, you will see no more. By this time next year, what was meant for your harm will be turned to your advantage.'

b'You dont need everybody to be for you; you just need the right people to be for you. God has people in positions of influence that will open doors you couldnt open, give you opportunity & promotion that you didnt see coming. You wont have to find them; theyll find you.'
b'Every seed you sow will come back to you. The mercy you show others is the mercy people will show you.\n\nCheck out "Keep Believing for Your Loved Ones" on Podcast here!  '

b'God doesnt change His mind. Hes already decided to show you mercy. Hes already decided to heal those wounds and give you another chance. Dont listen to the lies telling you that, Youre washed up, you blew it, just sit on the sidelines. Get back in the game.'
b'God didnt allow those scars so you could constantly think about your failures and poor choices. He allowed them so you would think about His mercy, His forgiveness.'

b'The scripture says, If you draw close to God, Hell draw close to you. Hes as close as the air you breathe. All you have to do is call out and Hes right there. \n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Keep Believing for Your Loved Ones" from Joel!   '
b'The enemy doesnt fight you for where you are; he fights you for where youre going.'
b'Favor is not going to keep you from the storm, but favor will bring you out of the storm. God wouldnt have allowed it if He didnt have a purpose for your good.'

b'God waited for us when we were off course. He showed us mercy when we werent at our best. Now we need to take that same mercy and show it to someone else.\n\nBe inspired by this message from Joel, "Keep Believing for Your Loved Ones". Check it out here:  '

b'Dont get bitter and relive all the negative. That scar is a reminder of how faithful God has been. Without His mercy, that mistake would have stopped you. Without His healing, that sickness would have been the end.'
b'We all have someone that were hoping will change. But if theyre going to reach their destiny, they need someone who will keep praying, keep encouraging, keep speaking faith into their future.'

b'The seeds you plant in peoples hearts are still alive. The soil may not be ready yet, but at the right time, God will soften their heart.\n\nClick here to watch, "Keep Believing for Your Loved Ones":  '

b'Everyone is on a journey. Where they are now is not where theyre going to be in ten years. Give them room to change. They may not believe like you believe, they may have different views, but thats okay.'
b'Thanks to everyone who joined us at SiriusXM radio. PowerFavorBook releases TOMORROW! Pre-order your copy and meet Joel at a book signing here:  '

b'Everyone needs someone that will stand in the gap, someone that will believe for them when they cant believe for themselves, someone that will cover them with mercy, not judge them, not condemn them.'
b'We write off people too easily. Where they are now is not where theyre going to end up.\n\nListen now to this new message from Joel, "Keep Believing for Your Loved Ones":  '

b'You have to call people what they can become before theyll ever change. Call your child blessed, call him disciplined, call him focused, call him successful. That friend thats addicted, start calling him free, whole, victorious.'
b'Gods not holding the past against you. Hes not upset because you ignored Him; Hes not turned off because you didnt believe. Hes waiting for you. His arms are opened wide.'

b'It looks like its going to take a long time to get well, to break the addiction, to meet the right person. No get ready. Its going to happen quickly. Its going to be unusual, out of the ordinary. Youre going to know its the hand of God.'

b'Will you wait on that friend thats making bad choices? Will you call them, encourage them, let them know that you care?\n\nWatch Joels new message this morning: "Keep Believing for Your Loved Ones"  '

b'God has people in your life because Hes counting on you, not to judge them, not to find fault, but to stand in the gap. Some of the people that we think are the furthest off course are chosen vessels.'
b"God controls the universe. When Hes ready to pay you back, people can't stop Him, bad breaks cant stop Him, all the forces of darkness cant keep Him from bringing justice."

b'You need to see your scars in a new light. God didnt allow that scar to discourage you. He allowed it to remind you of what He brought you through.'

b'Every person has been hurt. You cant live without wrongs being done to you. The question is, how do you respond? Jesus said, When somebody takes your shirt, give them your coat too. When they ask you to walk a mile, go two miles.'
b'People cant undo every wrong they\'ve done to you. The good news is God can. \n\nClick here to watch, "The Smile of God":  '
b'Be good to those that have betrayed you; show mercy to those that have lied about you; be kind to the people that tried to hold you back.'
b'Many things God asks us to do are not fair. Its not about being fair; its about passing the test. If youll do the right thing when its hard, God will make it up to you.'
b'Its easy to be good to people that are being good to us. The test is when theyve betrayed you, and now they need your help. Listen now to this message from Joel, "The Smile of God":  '

b'When God can trust you to handle favor, influence, and power without using it to be vindictive, to get even, to prove your point, then He can take you to new levels.'
b'Paying people back is overrated. Being vindictive, getting even doesnt bring you lasting joy.  Thats a temporary high, then its gone.'
b'One test we all have to pass is not just forgiving people but being good to those that have not been good to us.\n\nWatch Joels message this morning! "The Smile of God"  '

b'If you want to see real joy, real fulfillment, if you want to lie down at night in peace, then be kind to people when theres no reason. Show mercy when you have the advantage; lift someone up when they pushed you down.'
b'Everyone is dealing with something. There are no perfect people. A true friend will accept you where you are, faults, weaknesses, shortcomings and all.'

b'The scripture says, A good person falls seven times but gets back up again. You have come back power. God wouldnt have allowed the adversity if it was going to finish you off. Its just another step on the way to your destiny.'
b'Some things you just have to outlast. You have to be more determined than whats trying to hold you back.\n\nCheck out "Outlast the Opposition" on Podcast here!  '

b'If youll outlast the opposition, youll see the victory. Outlast the sickness, outlast the injustice, outlast the trouble at work, outlast the loneliness.\n\nClick here to watch, "Outlast the Opposition":  '

b'People cant stop your destiny. God being for you is more than the world being against you. Dont fight with your critics; outlast them. Let your actions speak for you; let your success do the talking.'

b'God is setting you up to show out in your life. He allowed that opposition to last, not because its going to stop you, but because its going to promote you. Its going to push you into a new level of your destiny.'
b'Stay on the high road. Let God be your vindicator. Let Him pay your enemies back. He sees whats happening.  Listen now to this new message from Joel, "Outlast the Opposition":  '
b'The way you win some battles is not by defeating the opposition, but by outlasting the opposition. You have to have staying power. Dont give up because its not happening on your timetable.'
b'Dont expect everything to be easy. Dont expect everyone to be for you. If it hasnt happened yet, that doesnt mean its not going to happen. The victory is on the other side of the opposition.'

b'Something happens in the struggle, when your mind says its never going to work out, but in your heart, you know what God promised is on the way.\n\nWatch Joels new message this morning! "Outlast the Opposition"  '

b'When life tries to push you down, step on you, take your health, squash your dreams, you have to get back up again. Outlast whats trying to defeat you. The power in you is greater than any power thats trying to stop you.'
b'They may write you off, but dont worry, God has already written you in. He chose you before you could choose Him. The scripture says His calling on your life is irrevocable.'

b'God said in Psalms, Touch not My anointed. You are His anointed. When people come against you, theyre not just messing with you; theyre messing with the God who put the blessing on you. What God has blessed, no person can curse.'
b'You dont have to try to hide your scars, be embarrassed by what youve been through. You can be at peace with your scars. Those scars are your testimony. Those scars are your story.'

b'Good breaks are going to find you. Opportunity is going to chase you down.

b'What people have spoken over you or what they havent spoken over you hasnt changed whats in you. It hasnt lessened your potential. There is greatness in you.'
b'You cant stop people from saying negative things, but you are not what people call you. You are what you answer to.\n\nDon\'t miss this powerful message, "Change Your Name" from Joel!   '
b'You have to be you. Theres no anointing on your life to be like someone else. You are anointed to be you.'

b'Huawei Statement Regarding UK 5G Decision from Victor Zhang, Vice-President, Huawei. '
b'"We agree a diverse vendor market and fair competition are essential for network reliability and innovation, as well as ensuring consumers have access to the best possible technology." '

b'"We have supplied cutting-edge technology to telecoms operators in the UK for more than 15 years. We will build on this strong track record, supporting our customers as they invest in their 5G networks, boosting economic growth and helping the UK continue to compete globally." '

b'From breakthrough improvements on the quality of results to new ways to search, Google is here to help you understand the worlds information.

 See all the updates coming to Google Search  

SearchOn '

b'Do you know that song that goes, da na na na na do do? We bet Google Search does.  Next time a song is stuck in your head, just HumToSearch into the Google app and well identify the song. Perfect pitch not required   SearchOn '

b'Your phones camera can do more than just take selfies. Soon with GoogleLens & AR, you can...
 Tap an image to discover products as you browse  
 Get help with homework problems 
 Virtually bring your dream car to your driveway

SearchOn '
b"From helping you with the right spelling in milliseconds to finding that exact passage in a webpage or moment in a video, Google Search uses AI to get just what you're looking for. SearchOn "

b'Make more informed decisions about the places you visit. Soon youll be able to see how busy a place is directly on the map and get safety infolike mask requirements and temperature checkson business profiles across Google Search and GoogleMaps. SearchOn '

b"Four key elements drive our work:

  Understanding all the world's information
  The highest quality information available
  World class security & privacy
  Open access for everyone

SearchOn"

b"Every day, people around the world rely on Google Search to deliver the highest quality information available for billions of queries. Here's how we think about our responsibility to build the best possible search engine "

b' SearchOn starts now! 

Watch the live show  

And stand by for updates & announcements right here. '

"

b'Scientists used a spacecraft over four billion miles from Earth to measure visible light that's not connected to any known source like stars or galaxies. 

Their findings?

 "There's as much light outside of galaxies as there is inside of galaxies."

b"If you're feeling numb or overburdened these days in response to another's pain or request for help, that doesn't make you unkind. You could be experiencing compassion fatigue.

b'Fact Check: Pence claims the U.S. "will have literally tens of millions of doses of vaccines before the end of this year."

The vaccines are being stockpiled  but that does not mean they'll be authorized for use (or available to the public) by that date.

b'Fact Check: Vice President Pence characterized the protests that followed George Floyd's killing as "rioting and looting."

That is misleading.

A recent report found that more than 93% of protests over the summer were peaceful.
'

b'Fact Check: Vice President Pence again claimed that Joe Biden and Kamala Harris want to allow abortion up to the moment of birth. 

This is not true.
'

b'Fact Check: Vice President Pence claimed Joe Biden and Kamala Harris want to "ban fracking."

That is simply false.

Joe Biden has said that he opposes new oil and gas drilling permits on public lands  but would not call for a nationwide fracking ban.
'

b'Vice President Pence says he and Trump "have a plan to improve health care and protect preexisting conditions for every American."

Trump has repeatedly promised to bring forward a GOP alternative to the Affordable Care Act.

He has not done so.
'

b'Fact Check: Pence said "when Joe Biden was vice president, we lost 200,000 manufacturing jobs.

That lacks context.

Manufacturing jobs were already plummeting when Obama and Biden took office  the Obama administration did not cause that drop.
'

b'Vice President Pence said "the American comeback is on the ballot."

That's a rosy economic outlook.

U.S. employers added 11.4 million jobs in the last 5 months. That's only half of the 22.2 million jobs that were lost in March and April.
'

b'Fact Check: Pence claims when he and Trump took office "America had gone through the slowest recovery since the Great Depression."

That's an exaggeration.

It was the slowest recovery since WWII, but also a long, uninterrupted recovery for the job market.

b'Fact Check: Vice President Pence claimed that "on day one, Joe Biden is going to raise your taxes."
